original: bde bar skyes pa'i lha //
analyzed: bde bar skyes pa'i lha //
translated: The deity who is born in bliss

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid //
translated: Is the very connate gnosis.

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
translated: The nondual method and wisdom

original: rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob nas //
analyzed: rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob nas //
translated: Gain mastery over the moving vāyu.

original: thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis //
analyzed: thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis //
translated: The method path is the means of bliss.

original: brtags pa rang gi rtog pa zlog /
analyzed: brtags pa rang gi rtog pa zlog /
translated: The imagined is averted by one’s own concept.

original: dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la //
translated: The essence of all entities

original: bzlog bya ngas kyang ma dmigs so //
analyzed: bzlog bya ngas kyang ma dmigs so //
translated: Is not observed as an object of negation.

original: bde ba'i thig le sa bon la //
analyzed: bde ba'i thig le sa bon la //
translated: The seed of the bindu of bliss

original: thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis //
analyzed: thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis //
translated: Is the dance of the four methods of the vāyu.

original: dga' ba'i tshad ldan nus pa bcas //
analyzed: dga' ba'i tshad ldan nus pa bcas //
translated: The one endowed with the measure of joy has power.

original: dngos 'di lhan cig skyes par brtan //🔽bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni; ;phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa //
analyzed: dngos 'di lhan cig skyes par brtan // bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni; ;phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa //
translated: This entity is stabilized in the connate.🔽The mahāmudrā of bliss

original: bde ba chen por ro gcig phyir //
analyzed: bde ba chen por ro gcig phyir //
translated: Is the single taste of the entire universe and inhabitants in great bliss.

original: ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas //
analyzed: ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas //
translated: Without exception, it abides in the connate.

original: bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni //
analyzed: bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni //
translated: The bindu of bliss that gathers the quintessence

original: yon tan kun gyi ngo bo bas //
analyzed: yon tan kun gyi ngo bo bas //
translated: Is the essence of all qualities.

original: che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs pas //
analyzed: che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs pas //
translated: Since all great qualities are complete,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas //
translated: It abides as the essence of all buddhas.

original: de nas rgyal pa rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: de nas rgyal pa rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Then, the Victor Vajradhara

original: rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis //
translated: The king of all the victors

original: ma lus lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir //
analyzed: ma lus lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir //
translated: In order to consecrate all the remaining deities

original: gsung gi snying po brjod par mdzad //
analyzed: gsung gi snying po brjod par mdzad //
translated: Recites the essence of speech.

original: brum bi shva bi shuddhe /
analyzed: brum bi shva bi shuddhe /
translated: Bhrum visva vishodhe.

original: h'um badzra dhrik /
analyzed: h'um badzra dhrik /
translated: Hum vajra dhrk.

original: aom dzi na dzika /
analyzed: aom dzi na dzika /
translated: Om jinam jik.

original: svam ratna dhrika /
analyzed: svam ratna dhrika /
translated: Svam ratna dhrk.

original: aom a'a ro lika /🔽ham pra dzny'a dhrik /
analyzed: aom a'a ro lika / ham pra dzny'a dhrik /
translated: Om arolik.🔽Hum prajna dhrk.

original: mum dh'a ti shva ri /🔽lam dve sha ra ti /
analyzed: mum dh'a ti shva ri / lam dve sha ra ti /
translated: Mum dhatishwari.🔽Lam dvesharati.

original: mam mo ha ra ti /🔽byam r'a ga ra ti /
analyzed: mam mo ha ra ti / byam r'a ga ra ti /
translated: Mam moharati.🔽Byam ragarati.

original: tam badzra ra ti /
analyzed: tam badzra ra ti /
translated: Tam vajra rati.

original: ksham ha r'a dza ya /
analyzed: ksham ha r'a dza ya /
translated: Ksham hara jaya.

original: tram aa garbha ya /
analyzed: tram aa garbha ya /
translated: Tram agrabhaya.

original: hr'i ha h'um padma ba da ya /
analyzed: hr'i ha h'um padma ba da ya /
translated: Hari ha hum padma bhaya.

original: dzhim ku ru pa na @250b hri; h'um l'a syee sa ma ya stvam//
analyzed: dzhim ku ru pa na @250b hri; h'um l'a syee sa ma ya stvam//
translated: Jhim kuru pana hri. Hum lasyai samaya stvam.

original: tram m'a lee sa ma ya ho /
analyzed: tram m'a lee sa ma ya ho /
translated: Tram male samaya ho.

original: hr'i g'i ti ra go ham/
analyzed: hr'i g'i ti ra go ham/
translated: Hari gati ragho ham.

original: aa nri tyee r'a ga ya mi /
analyzed: aa nri tyee r'a ga ya mi /
translated: Anritaye ragya mi.

original: me dha ra na sv'ah'a /
analyzed: me dha ra na sv'ah'a /
translated: Medharana svaha.

original: thlim  ni sa ram bha ya sv'ah'a /🔽h'um sva ra dza ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: thlim  ni sa ram bha ya sv'ah'a / h'um sva ra dza ya sv'ah'a /
translated: Thlim nisaram bhaya svaha.🔽Hum svaraja svaha.

original: mum shr'i aa ram ga ya sv'ah'a /🔽dza dhu pe pra be sha /
analyzed: mum shr'i aa ram ga ya sv'ah'a / dza dhu pe pra be sha /
translated: Mum shri arangaya svaha.🔽Jham dhupe prabesha.

original: h'um pushpe aa be sha /
analyzed: h'um pushpe aa be sha /
translated: Hum puspe avashesh.

original: bam dvi pa su ki ni /🔽ho gandha tsitta /🔽h'um ya m'anta krita dza phat/🔽h'um begha n'anta krita h'um phat/🔽h'um padm'a na ta krita bam phat/🔽h'um pra dzny'a nti krata ho phat/🔽aom mah'a badzra dha ra mah'a kro dhi shva ri dzva la ni phat/🔽aom mah'a ratna dha ra mah'a kro dhi shva ri dzva la ni phat/🔽aom mah'a padma dh'a ra ma h'a kro dhi shva ri dzva la ni phat/🔽aom ma h'a karma dha ra mah'a kro dhi shva ri dzva la ni phat/🔽h'um h'um h'um badzra tsitta h'um/🔽aa aa aa badzra bha dra sa manta aom/
analyzed: bam dvi pa su ki ni / ho gandha tsitta / h'um ya m'anta krita dza phat/ h'um begha n'anta krita h'um phat/ h'um padm'a na ta krita bam phat/ h'um pra dzny'a nti krata ho phat/ aom mah'a badzra dha ra mah'a kro dhi shva ri dzva la ni phat/ aom mah'a ratna dha ra mah'a kro dhi shva ri dzva la ni phat/ aom mah'a padma dh'a ra ma h'a kro dhi shva ri dzva la ni phat/ aom ma h'a karma dha ra mah'a kro dhi shva ri dzva la ni phat/ h'um h'um h'um badzra tsitta h'um/ aa aa aa badzra bha dra sa manta aom/
translated: Bam dvipa suki ni.🔽Ho gandha citta.🔽Hum yamantrakrita ja phat.🔽Hum begha nantrakrita hum phat.🔽Hum padmanantrakrita bam phat.🔽Hum prajnanantrakrita ho phat.🔽Om maha vajra dhara maha krodhi shvari jvala ni phat.🔽Om maha ratna dhara maha krodhi shvari jvala ni phat.🔽Om maha padma dhara maha krodhi shvari jvala ni phat.🔽Om maha karma dhara maha krodhi shvari jvala ni phat.🔽Hum hum hum vajra citta hum.🔽A a a vajra bhadra samanta om.🔽

original: aom mu ne krim sv'ah'a /🔽aom mu ne h'um drum sv'ah'a /🔽aom mu ne srum sv'ah'a; aom mu ne pram sv'ah'a /🔽aom mu ne sham sv'ah'a /🔽aom mu ne ye sv'ah'a /🔽aom ae ha hi bha ga w'a na /
analyzed: aom mu ne krim sv'ah'a /🔽aom mu ne h'um drum sv'ah'a /🔽aom mu ne srum sv'ah'a; aom mu ne pram sv'ah'a /🔽aom mu ne sham sv'ah'a /🔽aom mu ne ye sv'ah'a /🔽aom ae ha hi bha ga w'a na /
translated: Oṃ muṇe kṣiṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ muṇe hūṃ druṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ muṇe sruṃ svāhā. Oṃ muṇe praṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ muṇe śaṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ muṇe ye svāhā.🔽Oṃ e he hi bhagavān.🔽

original: mah'a ka ru n'i ka tri sha ho //
analyzed: mah'a ka ru n'i ka tri sha ho //
translated: Mahakarunika tri shha ho.

original: sa ma ya stvam/
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam/
translated: Samaya stvam.

original: dza:h'um bam ho:/ aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: dza:h'um bam ho:/ aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Jham hum bam ho. Om a hum svha.

original: ba ba ba ba ba /
analyzed: ba ba ba ba ba /
translated: Babababa bababa.

original: dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra /🔽sa sa sa sa sa /

translated: Dza dzra dzra dzra dzra.🔽Sa sa sa sa sa.

translated: Ya ya ya ya ya.

original: aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Om a hum svha.

analyzed: gsang ba zab mo sku gsung thugs //

original: gdod nas bdag dang dbyer med pa'i //

analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya stvam/ aom badzra sa ma ya ho //

analyzed: dza:h'um @251a *// bam ho://

analyzed: zhes brjod pas /

analyzed: sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mdzes pa dag /

original: gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga //
analyzed: gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga //

original: 'brel pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // rdo rje khro bo khro mo dang // sgo bzhi rab 'jam la sogs pa //
analyzed: 'brel pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // rdo rje khro bo khro mo dang // sgo bzhi rab 'jam la sogs pa //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyas par snang bar mdzad //

original: 'khor lo nyis brtsegs rtsibs su bcas //
analyzed: 'khor lo nyis brtsegs rtsibs su bcas //

original: khyams dang sgor bcas lha yi rim //
analyzed: khyams dang sgor bcas lha yi rim //
translated: With a courtyard and gates, the sequence of deities.

original: rang rang phyag mtshan gdan dang bcas //
analyzed: rang rang phyag mtshan gdan dang bcas //
translated: Each has their own hand implements and seats,

original: bzhugs thabs tshul bzhin gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs thabs tshul bzhin gnas pa'o //
translated: Residing in the proper way.

original: de nas rgyal ba de dag gis //
analyzed: de nas rgyal ba de dag gis //
translated: Then those victors,🔽In order to confer empowerment and blessings

original: dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la //🔽dbang bskur byin brlab bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la // dbang bskur byin brlab bya ba'i phyir //
translated: Upon those great mandalas,

original: gsang ba'i sngags ni gsung bar mdzad //
analyzed: gsang ba'i sngags ni gsung bar mdzad //
translated: Proclaimed the secret mantra:

original: aom mah'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
analyzed: aom mah'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
translated: Om maha shunyata jnana vajra sva bhawa atma ko ham

original: aom mah'a aa darsha dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
analyzed: aom mah'a aa darsha dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
translated: Oṃ mahādṛṣṭajñānavajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.

original: aom mah'a pra ty'a be ksha n'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/🔽aom mah'a sa manta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
analyzed: aom mah'a pra ty'a be ksha n'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/ aom mah'a sa manta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
translated: Oṃ mahāpratyavekṣaṇājñānavajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.🔽Oṃ mahāsaṃbodhijñānavajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.

original: aom mah'a kri ta aa nu shth'a na badzra @251b sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/🔽aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
analyzed: aom mah'a kri ta aa nu shth'a na badzra @251b sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/ aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
translated: Oṃ mahākṛtānuṣṭhānajñānavajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.🔽Oṃ sarvatathāgatakāyavajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a w'a ka badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a w'a ka badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
translated: Oṃ sarvatathāgatavāgvajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/🔽aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a aa nu r'a ga badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/ aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a aa nu r'a ga badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
translated: Oṃ sarvatathāgatacittavajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.🔽Oṃ sarvatathāgatānurakṣaṇavajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
translated: Oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjopahāravajra-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ.

original: zhes brjod ye shes sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: zhes brjod ye shes sku gsung thugs //
translated: Recite these and you will have the wisdom body, speech, and mind.

original: rtse gcig thim par gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rtse gcig thim par gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: The single peak will manifest as dissolution.

original: tsitta 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas //
analyzed: tsitta 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas //
translated: The Akaniṣṭha of the heart center is the place of blazing.

original: rin chen 'bar ba rdzogs pa'i mdzod //
analyzed: rin chen 'bar ba rdzogs pa'i mdzod //
translated: The blazing jewel is the perfect treasure.

original: mi shigs thig le za ma tog /
analyzed: mi shigs thig le za ma tog /
translated: The indestructible bindu is the casket.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas //
translated: It is the place where all victors reside.

original: tsitta'i khams lnga'i snying po la //
analyzed: tsitta'i khams lnga'i snying po la //
translated: The essence of the five elements of the heart center

original: bde ba'i thig le phra rags nyid //🔽ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid du //
analyzed: bde ba'i thig le phra rags nyid // ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid du //
translated: is the subtle and coarse bindu of bliss.🔽It is said to be the king who holds the secret

original: gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por brjod //
analyzed: gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por brjod //
translated: and is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: gang de dvangs ma ye shes lnga //
analyzed: gang de dvangs ma ye shes lnga //
translated: That is the five pristine consciousnesses of the pure essence,

original: gang du mi phyed rdo rje gsal //
analyzed: gang du mi phyed rdo rje gsal //
translated: where the indivisible vajra manifests.🔽The five poisons generate pristine consciousness

original: dug lnga ye shes bskyed pa dang // btsun mo dga' bde'i ngo bor brjod //
analyzed: dug lnga ye shes bskyed pa dang // btsun mo dga' bde'i ngo bor brjod //
translated: and are called the essence of the queen’s joy and bliss.

original: khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid //
analyzed: khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid //
translated: The pristine consciousness of the gathering of the five elements

original: rang byung ye shes bde ba'i thugs //
analyzed: rang byung ye shes bde ba'i thugs //
translated: is the heart of self-originated, blissful pristine consciousness.

original: rnam shes bzhir bcas thig le nyid //
analyzed: rnam shes bzhir bcas thig le nyid //
translated: The bindu together with the four kinds of consciousness

original: thugs kyi sems dpa' nyid du bshad //🔽de yis gang la dbang bsgyur ba'i //
analyzed: thugs kyi sems dpa' nyid du bshad // de yis gang la dbang bsgyur ba'i //
translated: is explained to be the bodhisattva of the heart.🔽The four objects that are controlled by that

original: yul bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud //
analyzed: yul bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud //
translated: are the essence of the blissful bindu.

original: sgyu ma'i bde bar gang 'char ba //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i bde bar gang 'char ba //
translated: Whatever arises as the bliss of illusion🔽is the bodhisattva of the secret place.

original: @252a *// yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste //
analyzed: @252a *// yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste //
translated: The four topics are explained in sequence.

original: dbang bsgyur gnyis med gang yin pas //
analyzed: dbang bsgyur gnyis med gang yin pas //
translated: The one who is not dual with the mastery

original: yab yum 'brel ba'i ngo bor bshad //
analyzed: yab yum 'brel ba'i ngo bor bshad //
translated: is explained as the essence of the connection between father and mother.

original: rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa'i rten //
analyzed: rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa'i rten //
translated: The support of the bindu of the essence of the nāḍīs

original: so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid //
analyzed: so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid //
translated: is endowed with individual power.

original: gang la de dbang de yi phyir //
analyzed: gang la de dbang de yi phyir //
translated: Since that is mastered,

original: 'di ni phyi yi rim par bshad //
analyzed: 'di ni phyi yi rim par bshad //
translated: this is explained as the outer sequence.

original: gang la khams lnga'i bde ba yis //
analyzed: gang la khams lnga'i bde ba yis //
translated: The one who is pleased by the bliss of the five elements,🔽the one who arranges the bindu,🔽the one who manifests the gnosis of the sky,

original: mnyes dang thig le bkod pa dang // nam mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang // de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: mnyes dang thig le bkod pa dang // nam mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang // de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te //
translated: and the one who pervades suchness

original: zag med bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: zag med bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: with the nature of uncontaminated bliss

original: phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad //
translated: pleases the buddhafields of the ten directions.

original: dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang gsal //
analyzed: dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang gsal //

original: thabs lam bcud du 'brel bar gsungs //
analyzed: thabs lam bcud du 'brel bar gsungs //
translated: are said to be connected to the essence of the path of methods.

original: gang de thabs chen gsal byas pas //
analyzed: gang de thabs chen gsal byas pas //
translated: Since that is clarified by the great method,

original: lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs //
analyzed: lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs //

original: bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba //
analyzed: bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba //

analyzed: ma lus 'joms la khro bo'o; ;bcud las 'das pa'i h'um gsum nyid //
translated: The three hūṃs are beyond the essence.

original: byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid //

original: yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyings //

original: ma lus rnam dag kun tu bzang //
analyzed: ma lus rnam dag kun tu bzang //

original: dvangs snyigs snying por 'brel pa yis //
analyzed: dvangs snyigs snying por 'brel pa yis //

original: nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas pas //
analyzed: nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas pas //

original: thig le btul nas bstan pa 'chang //
analyzed: thig le btul nas bstan pa 'chang //

analyzed: sprul pa'i sku ru bshad @252b pa yin; ;kun kyang ye shes lnga yi ro //

original: khyab par gnas pas rgyas btab cing //
analyzed: khyab par gnas pas rgyas btab cing //

original: snang srid bde chen sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: snang srid bde chen sku gsung thugs //

original: dran pa rtag tu gsal bzung ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa rtag tu gsal bzung ba'o //

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya //

original: gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus //
analyzed: gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus //

original: phyi nang rim pa'i dbu rtse can //
analyzed: phyi nang rim pa'i dbu rtse can //

original: ngo bo byin rlabs 'phags pa ste //
analyzed: ngo bo byin rlabs 'phags pa ste //
translated: The essence is the noble one’s blessing,

original: yon tan byin rlabs kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: yon tan byin rlabs kun gyi gnas //

original: gsang ba'i padma'i rang bzhin du //
analyzed: gsang ba'i padma'i rang bzhin du //
translated: In the nature of the secret lotus,

original: rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta //
analyzed: rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta //

original: nyi zla zil ba'i thig le nyid //
analyzed: nyi zla zil ba'i thig le nyid //

analyzed: phan tshun 'dres pa rlung gis phye; ;gsang ba'i khams lngas ye shes rol //

original: snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas //
analyzed: snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas //

original: dvangs ma lnga yi rang bzhin gsal //
analyzed: dvangs ma lnga yi rang bzhin gsal //

analyzed: rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par gsal; ;gsang ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa //

original: dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes //
analyzed: dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes //

original: rigs mchog yum gyi phyag rgya lnga //
analyzed: rigs mchog yum gyi phyag rgya lnga //
translated: The five mudras of the mother, the supreme family,🔽are seen when the time of separation from the aggregates is free of impurities.

analyzed: snyigs ma bral ba'i dus na blta; ;thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams //

original: rang rang thig le bde bar gsal //
analyzed: rang rang thig le bde bar gsal //

original: ye shes rnam shes dvangs ma rnams //
analyzed: ye shes rnam shes dvangs ma rnams //

original: bde ba chen po gsal bar shes //
analyzed: bde ba chen po gsal bar shes //

original: dam tshig bde ba'i chas kyis sgeg /
analyzed: dam tshig bde ba'i chas kyis sgeg /

original: sgo gsum 'brel cing thig ler chags //
analyzed: sgo gsum 'brel cing thig ler chags //

original: gang du bde ba'i sgra bsgrags te //
analyzed: gang du bde ba'i sgra bsgrags te //

original: bskyod cing 'phro ba'i gar gyis mnyes //
analyzed: bskyod cing 'phro ba'i gar gyis mnyes //

original: thugs @253a *// gang thig le brten pa'i gnas //
analyzed: thugs @253a *// gang thig le brten pa'i gnas //

original: gang yul bde bar dbang byed pa'i //
analyzed: gang yul bde bar dbang byed pa'i //

original: rten dang bcas pa'i bde ba yis //
analyzed: rten dang bcas pa'i bde ba yis //

original: rang rang thig le skyed par byed //🔽thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
analyzed: rang rang thig le skyed par byed // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
translated: generate the individual bindu.🔽The mind and the bindu, which are

analyzed: thugs dang thig ler bcas pa nyid // dgug 'dzin 'khyud cing gnas pa dang // thig le rlung dang bstod smad bsdams //

original: bskyod dang 'bebs pa'i thabs yin te //
analyzed: bskyod dang 'bebs pa'i thabs yin te //

original: tshim dang thig le dor ba dang // ye shes gsal bas bde sems rgyas //
analyzed: tshim dang thig le dor ba dang // ye shes gsal bas bde sems rgyas //

original: rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags //

original: gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang // rnam shes gang yin ta krid de //
analyzed: gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang // rnam shes gang yin ta krid de //

original: bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas //
analyzed: bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas //
translated: Since the nature of bliss is nonarising,

original: rtag chad mtshan ma bdag med pa //
analyzed: rtag chad mtshan ma bdag med pa //
translated: it is free from permanence, annihilation, signs, and a self.

original: sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags //
analyzed: sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags //

original: shes skyob don phyir gsang ba'i sngags //
analyzed: shes skyob don phyir gsang ba'i sngags //

original: shes pa gsum 'das sgrib zad pa //
analyzed: shes pa gsum 'das sgrib zad pa //

original: rang rig byed pa yid ces bya //
analyzed: rang rig byed pa yid ces bya //

original: rgyun gsum zad pa'i chos dbyings nyid //
analyzed: rgyun gsum zad pa'i chos dbyings nyid //

original: rtogs bya kun tu bzang mor bshad //
analyzed: rtogs bya kun tu bzang mor bshad //

original: 'khor ba'i sa bon nyon mongs bcas //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sa bon nyon mongs bcas //

original: zil pa'i thig sngon lam bzhin du //🔽thabs sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du yis //
analyzed: zil pa'i thig sngon lam bzhin du // thabs sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du yis //

original: gsang ba'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston //

analyzed: sa bon thig le ma skyes gzugs @253b bstan pa rim pa gsum du bstan //

analyzed: 'dod pa'i yan lag sum brgya dang // drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas //

original: tha mal zhen pa rang grol nas //
analyzed: tha mal zhen pa rang grol nas //

analyzed: rdo rje ze'u 'bru 'brel bskyod pas //

original: rang 'bar thig le gzugs su chags //
analyzed: rang 'bar thig le gzugs su chags //

analyzed: nyi ma zla ba shar ba'i 'od //

original: rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis //
analyzed: rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis //

original: 'khor ba'i mun pa kun bsal nas //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i mun pa kun bsal nas //

original: ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal //
analyzed: ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal //

original: de nyid gsang bar shes par bya //
analyzed: de nyid gsang bar shes par bya //

original: thugs kyi rang bzhin snying po nyid //

analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar //

original: dril bu padma rin po che //
analyzed: dril bu padma rin po che //

analyzed: padma dkar po rdo rje che //

analyzed: autpal klu shing po ti ste //

analyzed: lcags kyu zhags pa spho ta ho //

analyzed: ye shes rtse lnga chos khams dril // thugs la brtan @254a *//

analyzed: pa nyid du gsungs //

analyzed: thub chen nges par phyag gnyis shes //

analyzed: seg par go mtshon pi wang brdab //

analyzed: gzhan yang mthun pa skabs kyis brtag /

analyzed: mi mthun khyad par rgyas par bstan //

analyzed: rdo rje rin chen padma dang // rgya gram dril bu brgyad shes bya //

analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gol //

analyzed: rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so // padma 'khor lo ral gri lce //

analyzed: rgya gram khu tshur go cha mche //

analyzed: gzhan yang skabs dang mthun pa ste // rang rang don nyid rtse gcig pa'i //
translated: Moreover, they are in accord with the context.🔽The signs of the mind should be known as the single-pointed

original: thugs kyi rtags su shes par bya //
analyzed: thugs kyi rtags su shes par bya //
translated: meaning of each one.

original: dvangs ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas //
analyzed: dvangs ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas //

analyzed: gcod dang ma phyed dga' ba dang // ma gos bde ba bskyed pa nyid //

analyzed: rnam par mi rtog rim par shes //

analyzed: yon tan bskyed dang tha mal gcod //

analyzed: de bzhin ma gos ye shes nyid //

analyzed: so so yon tan cha las byung //

analyzed: rang rang rtsa bcud thig le'i dbyibs //

analyzed: so so nyid ltar rang gnas te //

analyzed: bde ba'i thig le nyid du shes; ;rang byung dvangs ma'i thig le nyid //

analyzed: 'brel ba'i tshul gyis kun snang ba //

analyzed: khu ba rtsa yi dbyibs gzugs nyid //

analyzed: bde chen thugs su gsal brtan pa //

original: thugs kyi dus su shes par bya //
analyzed: thugs kyi dus su shes par bya //

analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i; ;thig le gsal ba'i rang bzhin las //

analyzed: thugs mtshan che ba'i ye shes nyid //

analyzed: dpag tu med par rang snang ba //

original: bde ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od //

analyzed: ma lus de der snang ba nyid // ma lus gnyis med thig le yi //

original: bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga //

analyzed: de las phye bas mtshon pa'i sgo //

analyzed: gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'di dag kyang //

analyzed: thun mong gnas su bsgoms pa dang // mi shigs thig le'i snying po las; ;sku gsung thugs nyid gsal bar bya //

original: don dam thig le pad rtse la //
analyzed: don dam thig le pad rtse la //
translated: The ultimate bindu is the tip of the lotus,

original: rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya //
translated: clarified according to the stages.

original: de nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir //

original: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bshad //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bshad //

original: cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyis //
analyzed: cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyis //

original: rang snying rgyu yi sa bon h'um//
analyzed: rang snying rgyu yi sa bon h'um//

original: dag pas rim pas gsal ba la //
analyzed: dag pas rim pas gsal ba la //

original: rang rgyud 'byung lnga nyon mongs lnga //🔽rang byung lnga ru snang ba'i phyir //

analyzed: 'byung ba lnga nyid bsgom par bya //
translated: Therefore, one should meditate on the five elements.

original: ae yam:ram sum kem ram/
analyzed: ae yam:ram sum kem ram/
translated: E yaṃ vaṃ raṃ laṃ

original: so so las rnams byas nas ni //🔽nam mkha' gru gsum @255a *//
analyzed: so so las rnams byas nas ni // nam mkha' gru gsum @255a *//
translated: Having performed each activity,🔽the sky is a triangle,

original: zla gam rlung //
analyzed: zla gam rlung //
translated: the half-moon is wind,

original: khrag gi dpa' klong 'khrug pa dang // gti mug ro dang nga rgyal ri //
analyzed: khrag gi dpa' klong 'khrug pa dang // gti mug ro dang nga rgyal ri //
translated: and the mountain of pride is the corpse of delusion.

original: zhe sdang me nyid bsgom par bya //
analyzed: zhe sdang me nyid bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the fire of hatred.

original: mdog kyang rim par shes bya ste //
analyzed: mdog kyang rim par shes bya ste //
translated: The colors should be known in order.

original: las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin brtag /
analyzed: las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin brtag /
translated: One should examine the nature of the action.

original: brum las dur khrod gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: brum las dur khrod gzhal yas khang //
translated: From bhrūṃ, the celestial mansion of the charnel ground

original: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng dang // bar khyams gnyis ni sgo dang bcas //
analyzed: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng dang // bar khyams gnyis ni sgo dang bcas //
translated: has four wheels, a garland of skulls, and two courtyards with doors.

original: thod phreng sbrul gyi za ra tshags //
analyzed: thod phreng sbrul gyi za ra tshags //
translated: It is adorned with a garland of skulls and a canopy of snakes.

original: zhing gi gdul dang ka ba ste //
analyzed: zhing gi gdul dang ka ba ste //
translated: The pillars are made of human skin,

original: sprin nag dur khrod rgyan dang bcas //
analyzed: sprin nag dur khrod rgyan dang bcas //
translated: and it is adorned with black clouds and charnel grounds.

original: khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo dang // thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can //
analyzed: khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo dang // thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can //
translated: There are five or three skull walls with the goddesses of wrath, amṛtā, and so on.

original: nyi zla'i rgyan can bsam byas la //
analyzed: nyi zla'i rgyan can bsam byas la //
translated: One should visualize the ornaments of the sun and moon.

original: dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang // dri za gshin rje bzhon par bcas //
analyzed: dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang // dri za gshin rje bzhon par bcas //
translated: The arrogant yakṣas, rākṣasas, gandharvas, and yāmas are mounted on their vehicles.

original: de bzhin gsal bar bsgom par bya //🔽sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gsal bar bsgom par bya // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
translated: One should meditate on them clearly in the same way.

original: cho ga las byung rim pa yis //
analyzed: cho ga las byung rim pa yis //
translated: The stages that arise from the rite of the vajra of body, speech, and mind

original: gnyis med gsal bas de brtan phyir //
analyzed: gnyis med gsal bas de brtan phyir //
translated: are clear and nondual in order to stabilize that.

original: dbang bskur byin brlab rim bzhin bya //
analyzed: dbang bskur byin brlab rim bzhin bya //
translated: The empowerment is conferred and the blessing is done in stages.

original: sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis //
translated: The drops of union spread out

original: gdug pa ma lus btul nas ni //
analyzed: gdug pa ma lus btul nas ni //
translated: and tame all the wicked without exception.

original: rang rang rim pa gsal gyur nas //
analyzed: rang rang rim pa gsal gyur nas //
translated: After each stage is clarified,

original: h'um gis phyogs phyogs gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: h'um gis phyogs phyogs gdan la bzhugs //
translated: they sit on seats in the directions with hūṃ.

original: ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba //
analyzed: ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba //
translated: The eight he-letters are the seed syllables

original: dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs //🔽rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma //
analyzed: dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs // rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma //
translated: of the group of white ones, the group of thieves,🔽the group of confused ones, and the group of ashen ones.🔽The group of incense, the group of fierce ones,

original: spos mo dang ni gtum @255b mo dang // sme sha can dang ma tshogs ma'i //
analyzed: spos mo dang ni gtum @255b mo dang // sme sha can dang ma tshogs ma'i //
translated: the group of outcasts, and the group of prostitutes

original: so so'i cha lugs rngam thon nas //
analyzed: so so'i cha lugs rngam thon nas //
translated: each have their own terrifying accouterments.

original: sprul pa bzhi po la thim zhing //
analyzed: sprul pa bzhi po la thim zhing //
translated: They dissolve into the four emanations

original: rang rang las mdzad snying po sgrog /
analyzed: rang rang las mdzad snying po sgrog /
translated: and proclaim the essence of their respective activities.

original: 'dus te phyogs phyogs gnas par bya //
analyzed: 'dus te phyogs phyogs gnas par bya //
translated: They gather and remain in the directions.

original: he brgyad sa bon las byung ba //🔽stag dang seng+ge wa dang khyi //
analyzed: he brgyad sa bon las byung ba // stag dang seng+ge wa dang khyi //
translated: The eight he-letters are the seed syllables🔽of the piśācīs—tiger, lion, jackal, and dog,

original: bya rgod kang+ka 'ug pa dang // pho rog la sogs phra men rnams //
analyzed: bya rgod kang+ka 'ug pa dang // pho rog la sogs phra men rnams //
translated: vulture, kākāsyā, owl, and crow.

original: 'phro 'du las dang phyogs mdog mtshan //
analyzed: 'phro 'du las dang phyogs mdog mtshan //
translated: They emanate and reabsorb, and their colors and attributes are as in the sādhana.

original: rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin bsam //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin bsam //
translated: Think of them in stages, just as before.

original: phat bzhis rta dang phag gdong dang // sbrul dang spre'u gdong rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: phat bzhis rta dang phag gdong dang // sbrul dang spre'u gdong rim pa bzhin //
translated: The four Phat syllables are the horse, pig, snake, and monkey faces, respectively.

original: las dang sku mdog phyag mtshan yang //
analyzed: las dang sku mdog phyag mtshan yang //
translated: The activities, colors, and implements

original: rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin //
translated: are also arranged in order.

original: de dag 'khor lo dbus dang lnga //
analyzed: de dag 'khor lo dbus dang lnga //
translated: They are in the center of the wheel and the five

original: yab yum phyag rgya 'brel bar gnas //
analyzed: yab yum phyag rgya 'brel bar gnas //
translated: places, abiding in union with the father and mother consorts.

original: rtsibs mtshan gru chad bzhi dag la //
analyzed: rtsibs mtshan gru chad bzhi dag la //
translated: On the spokes and in the four corners,

original: gnas kyi ma mo dgod par bya //
analyzed: gnas kyi ma mo dgod par bya //
translated: one should arrange the ghoulish abodes.

original: bar khyams dang por phra men brgyad //
analyzed: bar khyams dang por phra men brgyad //
translated: On the first gallery are the eight piśācīs;

original: phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya //🔽sgo bzhir sgo ba rngam tshul gnas //
analyzed: phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya // sgo bzhir sgo ba rngam tshul gnas //
translated: they should be arranged in order in the cardinal and intermediate directions.

original: bar khyams tha ma dag la ni //
analyzed: bar khyams tha ma dag la ni //
translated: At the four doors, the gate guardians stand in a threatening manner.🔽On the last gallery

original: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
analyzed: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
translated: are the retinue of queens, concubines, and maids.

original: sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul nyid //
analyzed: sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul nyid //
translated: The colors, implements, and postures🔽should be arranged in order.

original: rim pa bzhin du 'god par bya; ;rin chen thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag /
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du 'god par bya; ;rin chen thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag /
translated: The jeweled skull-cup crown

original: gnas skabs dag tu 'tsham par bya //
analyzed: gnas skabs dag tu 'tsham par bya //
translated: should be in accordance with the occasion.

original: sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are also like that,

original: yan lag dkyil 'khor nyid du @256a *//
analyzed: yan lag dkyil 'khor nyid du @256a *//
translated: and the limbs are the maṇḍala.

original: bshad; ;gang phyir nam mkha'i ye shes nyid //
analyzed: bshad; ;gang phyir nam mkha'i ye shes nyid //
translated: Because it is the wisdom of space itself.

original: spros med dam pa nyid du 'dod //
analyzed: spros med dam pa nyid du 'dod //
translated: It is held to be the supreme, unelaborate state.

original: bde ba'i thig les kun khyab la //
analyzed: bde ba'i thig les kun khyab la //
translated: The bindu of bliss pervades everything.

original: chos nyid snying rje kun tu snang //
analyzed: chos nyid snying rje kun tu snang //
translated: Dharmatā is the all-pervading compassion.

original: thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu //
analyzed: thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu //
translated: The bindu is the seed of one’s heart essence.

original: zag pa med pa'i snying po yin //🔽ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po can //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i snying po yin // ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po can //
translated: It is the essence of the absence of outflows.🔽It contains the essence of the totality of all.

original: thig le gong 'og kun dang 'brel //🔽gnas pa khong stong tshul dag gis //
analyzed: thig le gong 'og kun dang 'brel // gnas pa khong stong tshul dag gis //
translated: The bindu is connected with everything above and below.🔽It pervades everything without exception

original: ma lus kun la khyab pa yin //
analyzed: ma lus kun la khyab pa yin //
translated: through the mode of being empty inside.

original: dzham sgo g-yo ba'i sa sgo can //
analyzed: dzham sgo g-yo ba'i sa sgo can //
translated: The jhaṃ gate is the gate of movement.

original: bskyod dang las kyis khyab byed pa //
analyzed: bskyod dang las kyis khyab byed pa //
translated: It is pervaded by the function of shaking.

original: lus khyab gnas dang las dag ni //
analyzed: lus khyab gnas dang las dag ni //
translated: The function and location that pervade the body

original: khyad par so sor snang ba yin //
analyzed: khyad par so sor snang ba yin //
translated: appear individually and distinctly.

original: de steng ti la ka'i rang bzhin //
analyzed: de steng ti la ka'i rang bzhin //
translated: Above that is the nature of the tilaka,

original: 'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid //
analyzed: 'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid //
translated: endowed with the eight blazing ones.

original: zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa //
analyzed: zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa //
translated: It performs the function of melting and blazing.

original: drag mo zhes kyang 'dod pa yin //🔽thig le sgo nas 'dzag pa'i bcud //
analyzed: drag mo zhes kyang 'dod pa yin // thig le sgo nas 'dzag pa'i bcud //
translated: It is also asserted to be the fierce one.🔽The essence that drips through the bindu gate

original: gsher dang 'dzag pa'i bam snying can //
analyzed: gsher dang 'dzag pa'i bam snying can //
translated: has the essence of the moist and dripping baṃ.

original: sdang dang 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: sdang dang 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin can //
translated: The nature of the wrathful and the descending

original: lus can gnas pa gsal bar bya //
analyzed: lus can gnas pa gsal bar bya //
translated: illuminates the abode of embodied beings.

original: gang la gang brten de yi rten //
analyzed: gang la gang brten de yi rten //
translated: Whatever is based on whatever, that is its basis.

original: thig le rtsar bcas bde ba'i rten //
analyzed: thig le rtsar bcas bde ba'i rten //
translated: The bindu with the nāḍīs is the basis of bliss.

original: de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa //
translated: That itself is generated and transformed

original: brten pas sa yid dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: brten pas sa yid dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: by the support, the maṇḍala of the earth and mind.

original: 'khor lo gzhal las rang bzhin te //
analyzed: 'khor lo gzhal las rang bzhin te //
translated: The maṇḍala is the nature of the celestial mansion;

original: rim pa gong 'og 'brel pa can //
analyzed: rim pa gong 'og 'brel pa can //
translated: the upper and lower stages are connected.

original: lus la gnas pas dur khrod de //
analyzed: lus la gnas pas dur khrod de //
translated: Since it exists in the body, it is a charnel ground;

original: kha dog rtsa @256b dang bcud bsdus pa'i //
analyzed: kha dog rtsa @256b dang bcud bsdus pa'i //
translated: the colors are the gathered essence of the nāḍīs.

original: rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa yin //
analyzed: rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa yin //
translated: It is endowed with ornaments and seats.

original: gang la brten pa'i thig le nyid //
analyzed: gang la brten pa'i thig le nyid //
translated: The bindu itself, on which one is based,

original: gnyis med bde ba chen po'i lha //
analyzed: gnyis med bde ba chen po'i lha //
translated: is the deity of nondual great bliss.

original: sa bon yi ge bde ba yis //
analyzed: sa bon yi ge bde ba yis //
translated: The seed syllable is bliss.

original: sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa nyid //🔽gcig kyang khams lnga'i bde ba'i ngos //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa nyid // gcig kyang khams lnga'i bde ba'i ngos //
translated: It is endowed with body, speech, and mind.🔽Although one, it exists in the manner of pervading

original: ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas //
analyzed: ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas //
translated: all aspects of the bliss of the five elements.

original: lus la thig le chen po gnas //
analyzed: lus la thig le chen po gnas //
translated: The great bindu exists in the body.

original: gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid //
analyzed: gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid //
translated: The place, the essence, and bliss

original: thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi //
analyzed: thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi //
translated: are the method and the arising from the method.

original: nam mkha'i ye shes dpag tu med //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ye shes dpag tu med //
translated: The pristine consciousness of space is immeasurable.

original: 'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad //
analyzed: 'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad //
translated: The four entrances and the eight stages

original: thig le gcig gis khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: thig le gcig gis khyad par 'phags //
translated: Are distinguished by the single bindu.

original: nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de //
analyzed: nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de //
translated: Since afflictions are exhausted, they are exhausted.

original: dvangs ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid //
analyzed: dvangs ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid //
translated: The pristine consciousness of the pure essence is the blazing of the five.

original: yul dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: yul dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature that possesses an object,

original: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang //
translated: The maṇḍala of blazing appears.

original: gnas kyi thig le bde ba can //
analyzed: gnas kyi thig le bde ba can //
translated: The bindu of the place is Sukhāvatī.

original: dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste //
analyzed: dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste //
translated: The eight cemeteries are secret.

original: gnyis med phra men nyid du bshad //
analyzed: gnyis med phra men nyid du bshad //
translated: Nonduality is explained as the fierce one.

original: thig le thabs dang bcas pa nyid //🔽dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i sgo dang 'brel //
analyzed: thig le thabs dang bcas pa nyid // dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i sgo dang 'brel //
translated: The bindu itself is endowed with method.🔽It is connected with the door of entering the maṇḍala.

original: snying po thig le nyid du sbyor //
analyzed: snying po thig le nyid du sbyor //
translated: It is united with the bindu of the essence.

original: gang dang lhan cig skyes pa las //
analyzed: gang dang lhan cig skyes pa las //
translated: From that which is connate,🔽Great bliss is nonarising.

original: bde ba chen po skye ba med; ;ma lus bde ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: bde ba chen po skye ba med; ;ma lus bde ba chen po nyid //
translated: The great bliss of the body

original: khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o //
translated: Is the all-pervading, uninterrupted vastness.

original: ma lus 'dus pa'i bde ba'i ro //
analyzed: ma lus 'dus pa'i bde ba'i ro //
translated: The taste of bliss that gathers everything

original: sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'//🔽rang byung @257a *//
analyzed: sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'// rang byung @257a *//
translated: Is the space that gathers the thirteen stages.🔽The form of the great pervasiveness

original: khyab pa chen po'i gzugs //
analyzed: khyab pa chen po'i gzugs //
translated: Is the self-originated one.

original: kun 'dus thig le chen por gsal //
analyzed: kun 'dus thig le chen por gsal //
translated: Are clear in the great, all-embracing bindu.

original: rnam thar gsum ldan ae yi gzugs //
analyzed: rnam thar gsum ldan ae yi gzugs //
translated: The form of the letter E has three doors of liberation.🔽The vāyu that moves bliss, arouses the bindu,

original: bde ba bskyod dang thig le bskul; ;'phro dang sdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung //
analyzed: bde ba bskyod dang thig le bskul; ;'phro dang sdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung //
translated: And is distributed, gathered, and bound

original: rdo rje padma 'dus pa'i sa //
analyzed: rdo rje padma 'dus pa'i sa //
translated: Is the place where the vajra and lotus meet.

original: rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa //
analyzed: rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa //
translated: The place of bliss, free from support,

original: shu kra'i thig le gang gsher ba //
analyzed: shu kra'i thig le gang gsher ba //
translated: Is the bindu of śukra, which is moist.🔽That is the nature of the secret water.

original: gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin yin; ;de dag phyag rgyas gang sbyar bas //
analyzed: gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin yin; ;de dag phyag rgyas gang sbyar bas //
translated: When those are joined with the mudra,

original: bde ba'i drod ni rang 'bar skye //
analyzed: bde ba'i drod ni rang 'bar skye //
translated: The heat of bliss naturally arises.

original: brum las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: brum las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang //
translated: The secret celestial mansion arises from bhrūṃ.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma rtog /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma rtog /
translated: The precious buddha is conceived in the womb.

original: sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying po can //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying po can //
translated: The essence of the gathering of all varieties

original: khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te //
analyzed: khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te //
translated: Is the special Akaniṣṭha.

original: yon tan rdzogs pa'i dngos gzhi can //
analyzed: yon tan rdzogs pa'i dngos gzhi can //
translated: The actual basis of perfect qualities

original: dga' bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo dang ldan //
analyzed: dga' bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo dang ldan //
translated: Has the door of entry of the four joys.

original: 'bab 'dzeg thig le'i skas dang ldan //
analyzed: 'bab 'dzeg thig le'i skas dang ldan //
translated: It has the ladder of the descending and ascending bindu.

original: bde ba nyi zla rgyal la bzhugs //
analyzed: bde ba nyi zla rgyal la bzhugs //
translated: It is the seat of the sun and moon of bliss.

original: thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i ro //
analyzed: thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i ro //
translated: The taste of bliss is the merging of the bindu.

original: nyi zla 'brel ba bde ba'i lha //
analyzed: nyi zla 'brel ba bde ba'i lha //

original: mthung dang rdubs pa'i thabs chen gyis //
analyzed: mthung dang rdubs pa'i thabs chen gyis //
translated: The great method of inhaling and exhaling

original: 'khor ba'i sa bon zad ces pas //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sa bon zad ces pas //

original: za byed khro bor de bshad pa'o //
analyzed: za byed khro bor de bshad pa'o //
translated: The one who consumes is explained as wrathful.

original: dpag med thig le'i rang bzhin gang //
analyzed: dpag med thig le'i rang bzhin gang //
translated: The one who has the nature of immeasurable bindus

original: sa ya bcu gsum pho brang na //
analyzed: sa ya bcu gsum pho brang na //
translated: in the palace of the thirteen grounds

original: bde ba chen po ye shes gzugs //
analyzed: bde ba chen po ye shes gzugs //
translated: is the form of the gnosis of great bliss,

original: sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig bzhugs //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig bzhugs //
translated: existing together with body, speech, and mind.

original: 'du shes gsum ldan byin brlabs te //
analyzed: 'du shes gsum ldan byin brlabs te //
translated: Having empowered the three perceptions,

original: gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas //
translated: the secret is sealed with the five gnoses

original: dbang thob rnams la rgyas @257b btab bo //
analyzed: dbang thob rnams la rgyas @257b btab bo //
translated: for those who have obtained empowerment.

original: gsang ba thig le chen po ni //
analyzed: gsang ba thig le chen po ni //
translated: The great secret bindu

original: rang byung bde ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: rang byung bde ba chen po nyid //
translated: is the great, naturally arisen bliss.

original: rnam rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi //
analyzed: rnam rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi //
translated: The movement of conceptuality is severed

original: rdo rje padma'i bar na gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje padma'i bar na gnas //
translated: and abides between the vajra and lotus.

original: 'og sgo snying po padma ni //
analyzed: 'og sgo snying po padma ni //
translated: The essence lotus of the lower door

original: rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor te //
translated: is the maṇḍala of all victors.

original: gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid du //
analyzed: gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid du //
translated: The secret is the body, speech, and mind

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas //

analyzed: ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid //

analyzed: gnyis med bcud du gyur pa ni //

original: de yi bde ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: de yi bde ba chen po nyid //

analyzed: khyab pa'i tshul gyis gang bar bzhugs //

analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho lhan cig skyes //

original: gsang ba'i thig le bde ba'i ro //
analyzed: gsang ba'i thig le bde ba'i ro //

analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad //

analyzed: de nas rgyal ba thams cad kun // gdul bya bsam pa'i khyad par gyis //

analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par; ;rdo rje khro bor snang gyur te //

analyzed: bskyed cing gdug pa 'dul ba yi //

analyzed: drag po lha yi sngags dag dang // de yi gzhal yas snang bar mdzad //

analyzed: brum bi shva bi shuddhe /

analyzed: s'urya tsandra manda la h'um/

analyzed: de steng so so'i sku nyid dag /

analyzed: gsal ba'i rim pa dgod par bya //

analyzed: ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa h'um h'um h'um phat/ aom padma mah'a shr'i he ru ka mah'a tsanda sarba dushtan ta kaha na da ha pa tsa h'um h'um h'um phat/

original: aom karma mah'a shr'i he ru ka ma h'a tsanda sarba dushtan ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa h'um h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: aom karma mah'a shr'i he ru ka ma h'a tsanda sarba dushtan ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa h'um h'um h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ karma mahāśrī heruka mahācanda sarvaduṣṭaṃ anta ka hanada pāca hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a kro dhi shva ri sarba dushtan h'um phat/
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a kro dhi shva ri sarba dushtan h'um phat/

analyzed: aom mah'a badzra dha ra kro dhi shva ri dza la ni h'um phat/

analyzed: aom mah'a s'urya ratna mah'a kro dhi shva ri bi da ma h'um phat/

analyzed: 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che //

analyzed: aom badzra kro dha sa ma ya phat/

analyzed: kha ram yo gi ni kh'a hi ho://

analyzed: gsang sngags drag po mthu yis ni //

analyzed: phyogs bcu tshig cing rab tu tshig /

analyzed: kun tu rab tu tshig par 'gyur //

analyzed: 'bar ba rab 'byams kun tu 'bar //

analyzed: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor khro tshogs kyis //

analyzed: gang zhig rab gang kun tu gang //

analyzed: 'khrugs dang rab 'khrugs kun tu 'khrugs //

original: 'thor zhing rab 'thor kun tu 'thor //
analyzed: 'thor zhing rab 'thor kun tu 'thor //

original: 'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: 'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te //

original: phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang la yi //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang la yi //

analyzed: sgra bo che yang sgrog par byed //

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa //

analyzed: thul zhing brgyal nas myos gyur te // de dag bde bas bslangs byas te //

analyzed: bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i @259a *//

analyzed: gar; ;phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' thug par //

analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed //

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i rang bzhin las //

original: thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgyur //
analyzed: thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgyur //

original: gdod nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: gdod nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid //

original: ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid //
analyzed: ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid //

original: ma lus thig ler rgyas btab pa //
analyzed: ma lus thig ler rgyas btab pa //

original: nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid //

original: ma lus bde ba'i thig le nyid //
analyzed: ma lus bde ba'i thig le nyid //

original: khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin te //

original: mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che //
analyzed: mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che //

analyzed: snying rje chen por brjod pa yin; ;kun gyi rgyu ni thig le ste // ma lus sa bon rtsa ba nyid //

original: mi shigs snying ga'i pho brang nyid //
analyzed: mi shigs snying ga'i pho brang nyid //

original: ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang //

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid de //

analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas so //

analyzed: nyon mongs gdug pa'i gdan khri nyid //

analyzed: gdul bya thub pa nyid du bstan //

analyzed: phung po nyon mongs lnga dag pa; ;rgyal po lnga yi rang bzhin te //

analyzed: rang snying dvangs mar bcas pa nyid //

analyzed: dbang phyug lnga ru brjod pa nyid //

analyzed: rnam shes yul du bcas pa nyid //

analyzed: rten dang brten par bcas pa yi //

analyzed: bde ba phra men bcu drug nyid //

analyzed: phyi lta nang lta dkyil 'khor nyid //

analyzed: dbang phyug nam mkha'i dbang mo tshogs //

analyzed: dbab pa nye ba'i tshul bzung nas //

analyzed: thig le dbab pa'i thabs bzhi yis //

analyzed: phab pas rang rgyud dngos po sreg /

analyzed: dran 'byung rig pa'i 'phro 'du tshogs //

analyzed: bde ba chen po'i don la 'jug /

analyzed: gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar //

original: sku gsung thugs su kun gsal bas //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs su kun gsal bas //
translated: All is clear in the body, voice, and mind.

original: gnyis med thim pas mnyse par mdzad //
analyzed: gnyis med thim pas mnyse par mdzad //
translated: The maṇḍala of the bliss of nonduality is pacified.

original: rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun //
analyzed: rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun //
translated: All the maṇḍalas of the bliss of the nature

original: rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim //
analyzed: rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim //
translated: dissolve into the dhātu of the experience of vidyā.

original: dran rtog 'byung ba nyon mongs kun //
analyzed: dran rtog 'byung ba nyon mongs kun //
translated: All the afflictions that arise from memory

original: tshig pa gsum du shes par bya //
analyzed: tshig pa gsum du shes par bya //
translated: should be known as the three burnings.

original: ye shes bde ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: ye shes bde ba chen po nyid //
translated: The pristine consciousness of great bliss

original: 'bar ba gsum du shes par bya //
analyzed: 'bar ba gsum du shes par bya //
translated: should be known as the three blazings.

original: byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis //
translated: The bliss of bodhicitta

original: ma lus gang zhig khyab par gyur //
analyzed: ma lus gang zhig khyab par gyur //
translated: pervades all without exception.

original: thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid //
analyzed: thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid //
translated: The upper and lower bindus are above and below.

original: thig le gong ma nyid 'og tu //
analyzed: thig le gong ma nyid 'og tu //
translated: The upper bindu is below.

original: 'og ma nyid ni steng du 'bar //
analyzed: 'og ma nyid ni steng du 'bar //
translated: The lower one blazes above.🔽One, two, the whole body is pervaded by the scattered [bindu].🔽The body and the nāḍīs move,

original: gcig gnyis lus kun khyab par 'thor; ;lus dang rtsar bcas 'gul ba dang // ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas gang //
analyzed: gcig gnyis lus kun khyab par 'thor; ;lus dang rtsar bcas 'gul ba dang // ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas gang //
translated: and the bliss of trembling and blazing fills [one].

original: bde bsad dbang bsgyur tshim pa'i sgra //
analyzed: bde bsad dbang bsgyur tshim pa'i sgra //
translated: The sound of satisfaction, the mastery of bliss,🔽is proclaimed, pervading everything.

original: ma lus khyab par sgrog par byed; ;sku gsung thugs kyi bha ga nyid //
analyzed: ma lus khyab par sgrog par byed; ;sku gsung thugs kyi bha ga nyid //
translated: The bhaga of body, speech, and mind

original: bde ba chen po'i nam mkha'i dbyings //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i nam mkha'i dbyings //
translated: is the realm of the space of great bliss.

original: 'byung bzhi rdo rje padma nyid //
analyzed: 'byung bzhi rdo rje padma nyid //
translated: The vajra and lotus of the four elements

original: reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba nyid //
analyzed: reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba nyid //
translated: is the bliss of the union of touch.

original: re dogs rgyu ba chad pa @260a *//
analyzed: re dogs rgyu ba chad pa @260a *//
translated: The cessation of the movement of hope and fear

original: nyid; ;de bzhin nyid du blta bar bya //
analyzed: nyid; ;de bzhin nyid du blta bar bya //
translated: is to be seen as suchness.

original: thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis //
analyzed: thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis //
translated: The bliss of the mingling of the bindus

original: sa yang bcu gsum khyab pa'i yid //🔽ma lus mkha' ltar dri med pa'i //
analyzed: sa yang bcu gsum khyab pa'i yid // ma lus mkha' ltar dri med pa'i //
translated: is the mind that pervades the thirteenth stage.🔽The space of everything, stainless,

original: rang byung phyogs med kun tu snang //
analyzed: rang byung phyogs med kun tu snang //
translated: self-originated, appears everywhere impartially.

original: thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis //
translated: The bliss of method and wisdom

original: 'byung bzhi rim pa'i dvangs ma ste //
analyzed: 'byung bzhi rim pa'i dvangs ma ste //
translated: is the pure essence of the stages of the four elements.

original: sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags /
analyzed: sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags /
translated: The seed is known as the cause of bliss.

original: bha ga padma'i snying po nyid //
analyzed: bha ga padma'i snying po nyid //
translated: The essence of the bhaga lotus

original: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi //🔽bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi // bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten //
translated: Is the abode of the maṇḍala of body, speech, and mind.

original: sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod //
translated: The vessel of the precious buddha

original: phung po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga //
analyzed: phung po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga //
translated: Is the five aggregates and the five afflictions

original: ye shes lnga yis zil gyis mnan //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yis zil gyis mnan //
translated: Subjugated by the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: nyi zla padma'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: nyi zla padma'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: Seated on the seat of the sun, moon, and lotus,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni //
translated: The essence of all buddhas

original: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: Is the nature of great bliss.

original: thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid na //
analyzed: thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid na //
translated: At the time of the meeting of the bindu,

original: ye shes lnga yi ro dang ldan //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi ro dang ldan //
translated: It possesses the taste of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: gdul bya 'joms pa'i khro bo lnga //
analyzed: gdul bya 'joms pa'i khro bo lnga //
translated: The five wrathful ones who conquer the objects to be tamed

original: 'byung lnga dbang phyug rnam par bstan //
analyzed: 'byung lnga dbang phyug rnam par bstan //
translated: Are explained to be the lords of the five elements.🔽The object of the consciousness that experiences objects and objects

original: myong dang yul bcas rnam shes yul; ;phra men nyid du shes par bya //
analyzed: myong dang yul bcas rnam shes yul; ;phra men nyid du shes par bya //
translated: Should be known as the ḍākinīs.

original: phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba bzhi //
analyzed: phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba bzhi //
translated: The four yogas with the mudra

original: sgor bcas nyid du shes par bya //
analyzed: sgor bcas nyid du shes par bya //
translated: Should be known as the doors.

original: sgal tshigs 'jug pa'i thig le nyid //
analyzed: sgal tshigs 'jug pa'i thig le nyid //
translated: The bindu that enters the spine

original: dbang phyug bde bar shes par bya //
analyzed: dbang phyug bde bar shes par bya //
translated: Should be known as the bliss of the lord.

original: gnyis ka phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: gnyis ka phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: The nature of both is directed toward the two.

original: bde ba chen po spyan drangs pas //
analyzed: bde ba chen po spyan drangs pas //
translated: The great bliss is invited.

original: rtog pa bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug /
analyzed: rtog pa bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug /
translated: The maṇḍala of bliss is entered into the concept.

original: rim pa gnyis @260b med brda 'jal mchog /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis @260b med brda 'jal mchog /
translated: The supreme sign of the two stages is understood.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi thig le nyid //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi thig le nyid //
translated: The bindu of body, speech, and mind

original: gnyis su med par thim par mdzad //
analyzed: gnyis su med par thim par mdzad //
translated: dissolves into the nondual.

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug pho mo kun //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug pho mo kun //
translated: All the lords of yogins and yoginīs

original: bde ba chen po mnyes par gyur //
analyzed: bde ba chen po mnyes par gyur //
translated: are pleased with great bliss.

original: sangs rgyas gang tshe snying po la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gang tshe snying po la //
translated: When the buddhas are in the essence,

original: ma lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan //
analyzed: ma lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan //
translated: all are endowed with the nature of bliss.

original: thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro //
analyzed: thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro //
translated: The taste of bliss of the nondual bindu

original: ye shes lnga ldan zag pa med //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan zag pa med //
translated: is endowed with five pristine consciousnesses and is undissipating.

original: phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: The maṇḍala that fills the outside and inside

original: ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te //🔽nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las //
analyzed: ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te // nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las //
translated: is the nature of the assembly of all.🔽The innate is clarified from the dance

original: lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: of the mixture of the sun and moon.🔽The vajra nature of the bindu

original: sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i //🔽thig le rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i // thig le rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: of the assembly of the thirteen stages

original: gnyis med 'khril ba zhes bya ste //
analyzed: gnyis med 'khril ba zhes bya ste //
translated: is called “the embrace of nonduality.”

original: rang rig bde ba chen por thim //
analyzed: rang rig bde ba chen por thim //
translated: It dissolves into the great bliss of reflexive awareness.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen de yi dbyig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen de yi dbyig /
translated: The jewel of the Buddha is its treasure.

original: kha sbyor snying po za ma tog /
analyzed: kha sbyor snying po za ma tog /
translated: The essence of union is a casket.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang las //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang las //
translated: From the palace of enlightened body, speech, and mind,

original: ma lus thig le gnas par mdzad //
analyzed: ma lus thig le gnas par mdzad //
translated: the bindu is caused to abide without exception.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang ni //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang ni //
translated: The palace of enlightened body, speech, and mind

original: bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid de //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid de //
translated: is the very place of great bliss.

original: rdo rje snying po rtsa dang 'brel //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po rtsa dang 'brel //
translated: The vajra essence is connected with the nāḍī.

original: gnyis med bde ba'i thig ler gnas //
analyzed: gnyis med bde ba'i thig ler gnas //
translated: It is the bindu of nondual bliss.

original: gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni //
analyzed: gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni //
translated: The great secret bindu

original: ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud yid de //
analyzed: ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud yid de //
translated: is the essence that gathers everything without exception.

original: gsang ba yon tan rdzogs pa'i mdzod //
analyzed: gsang ba yon tan rdzogs pa'i mdzod //
translated: The secret is the perfect treasure of qualities.

original: snying po'i lam la gnas par bya //🔽rdo rje nyi ma'i snying po la //
analyzed: snying po'i lam la gnas par bya // rdo rje nyi ma'i snying po la //
translated: One should abide on the path of the essence.🔽In the essence of the vajra sun,

original: rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan //
analyzed: rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan //
translated: it is adorned with the light of the vajra moon.

original: gnyis med thig les gang ba yi //
analyzed: gnyis med thig les gang ba yi //
translated: Filled with the bindu of nonduality,

original: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char //
translated: the nature of great bliss arises.

original: brten nas 'byung ba'i rten @261a *//
analyzed: brten nas 'byung ba'i rten @261a *//
translated: The support of the supported

original: can nyid // gang la gang gis mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: can nyid // gang la gang gis mnyam sbyor bas //
translated: is the union of one with the other.

original: thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi //
analyzed: thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi //
translated: From the method of the great method,

original: bde ba chen po 'bar bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba chen po 'bar bar 'gyur //
translated: great bliss blazes.

original: de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid //
translated: Then Vajraheruka himself

original: rang rang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: rang rang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: In the very maṇḍala of his own mind,

original: gdul bya'i ngo la dgongs mdzad de //
analyzed: gdul bya'i ngo la dgongs mdzad de //
translated: Thinking of the faces of those to be tamed,

original: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad //
analyzed: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad //
translated: Illuminates the maṇḍala of his mind.🔽Vajra, vajra, and the bell,

original: rdo rje rdo rje dril bu dang // 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs //
analyzed: rdo rje rdo rje dril bu dang // 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs //
translated: And the world with its continents are lifted up.

original: de bzhin 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs //
analyzed: de bzhin 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs //
translated: Likewise, the wheel with its continents is lifted up.🔽Likewise, the discus, the battle-ax, and the khaṭvāṅga are brandished.

original: de bzhin 'khor lo dgra sta dang // kha tv'am rab tu 'khrol ba 'o; ;nor bu rin chen rgyu zhags dang // rdo rje dgra sta rab tu rdeb //
analyzed: de bzhin 'khor lo dgra sta dang // kha tv'am rab tu 'khrol ba 'o; ;nor bu rin chen rgyu zhags dang // rdo rje dgra sta rab tu rdeb //
translated: The jewel, the lasso, and the vajra battle-ax are brandished.🔽The supreme passion, the great lotus,

original: chags mchog padma chen po dang // dril bu rnga yi sgra sgrog pa'o //
analyzed: chags mchog padma chen po dang // dril bu rnga yi sgra sgrog pa'o //
translated: And the bell resound like a drum.🔽The action, the sword, the great plow, and the world

original: las ni ral gri gshol chen dang // 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste //
analyzed: las ni ral gri gshol chen dang // 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste //
translated: Are thrown far away.

original: bar ma rdo rje dung mar 'khrug /
analyzed: bar ma rdo rje dung mar 'khrug /
translated: The intermediate vajra and conch are shaken.

original: sti ra chen po rab rdeb pa'o //🔽btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang //
analyzed: sti ra chen po rab rdeb pa'o // btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang //
translated: The great flaying knife is brandished.🔽The great queen Heruka

original: 'khril bas padma rakta stob //
analyzed: 'khril bas padma rakta stob //
translated: Embraces, and the lotus is filled with blood.

original: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni //
translated: The mudra of the places and the countries

original: byis dbyug mda' gzhu rgyal mtshan dang // byis snying rdo rje za rdeg tshul //
analyzed: byis dbyug mda' gzhu rgyal mtshan dang // byis snying rdo rje za rdeg tshul //
translated: and they act as if they are eating the children’s hearts with vajra-fists.🔽The children’s hearts are red conches, and the children are moving.

original: byis snying dung dmar byis rgyu dang // mgo lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas //
analyzed: byis snying dung dmar byis rgyu dang // mgo lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas //
translated: The heads and bodies are connected.🔽The upper and lower parts are intertwined, outside and inside.

original: steng 'og phyi nang bsnol ba dang // byis ldag khog pa dral zhing lta //
analyzed: steng 'og phyi nang bsnol ba dang // byis ldag khog pa dral zhing lta //
translated: The children lick, the bellies are split open, and they are looked at.

original: rgyu mgo zhing khur rgyu gri dang // rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa 'o //
analyzed: rgyu mgo zhing khur rgyu gri dang // rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa 'o //
translated: They hold axes, plows, swords, and vajra hooks.

original: @261b lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu 'khrol bas slong bar byed //
analyzed: @261b lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu 'khrol bas slong bar byed //
translated: The hooks, lassos, chains, and bells are rung to summon.

original: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
analyzed: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
translated: The retinue of queens, maids, and servant girls

original: bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes //
analyzed: bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes //
translated: are twelve and eight in number.

original: rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas //
analyzed: rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas //
translated: They are ready with their seats, implements, and whatever is to be done.

original: kun kyang mdzes pa'i rgyan dang bcas //
analyzed: kun kyang mdzes pa'i rgyan dang bcas //
translated: All of them are adorned with beautiful ornaments.

original: zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khril tshul can //
analyzed: zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khril tshul can //
translated: They have smiling faces, flirtatious eyes, and seductive ways.

original: dbu skra ral pa lcang lo bcings //
analyzed: dbu skra ral pa lcang lo bcings //
translated: Their hair is bound in topknots.

original: sha da ba yi glu len cing //
analyzed: sha da ba yi glu len cing //
translated: They sing the songs of the śāpas.

original: dmar la rdul ldem chags pa'i tshul //
analyzed: dmar la rdul ldem chags pa'i tshul //
translated: They are red, passionate, and flirtatious.

original: snam zheng che la rked pa phra //
analyzed: snam zheng che la rked pa phra //
translated: The hips are wide and the waist is slender.

original: nu 'bur stod smad bye zhing 'gying //🔽dmar la klan zhing 'dud tshul can //
analyzed: nu 'bur stod smad bye zhing 'gying // dmar la klan zhing 'dud tshul can //
translated: The breasts are full and firm,🔽red, plump, and pliant.

original: gus dang steg pa'i ngang tshul 'chang //
analyzed: gus dang steg pa'i ngang tshul 'chang //
translated: They have a respectful and haughty demeanor.

original: so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni //
analyzed: so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni //
translated: They sit on their individual seats.

original: srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang //
analyzed: srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang //
translated: The rākṣasī is dark blue and holds a fresh skull.

original: tshangs ma dmar ser padma bsnams //
analyzed: tshangs ma dmar ser padma bsnams //
translated: Brahmāṇī is orange and holds a lotus.🔽Maheśvara is white-green and holds a trident.

original: lha chen dkar ljang tri sh'u la; ;gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang //
analyzed: lha chen dkar ljang tri sh'u la; ;gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang //
translated: Kāmadeva is blue and holds a discus.

original: gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phel //
analyzed: gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phel //
translated: Kumāra is red and holds a javelin.

original: brgya byin dkar mo aindra gdengs //
analyzed: brgya byin dkar mo aindra gdengs //
translated: Indra is white and holds an indra spear.

original: rdo rje ser mo tsandan 'thung //
analyzed: rdo rje ser mo tsandan 'thung //
translated: Vajrī is yellow and drinks sandalwood.

original: bdud rtsi dmar mo padma bsnams //🔽zla ba dkar mo punda r'i //
analyzed: bdud rtsi dmar mo padma bsnams // zla ba dkar mo punda r'i //
translated: Amṛtā is red and holds a lotus.🔽Candro is white and holds a puṇḍarīka.

original: be con ljang nag dbyug tho 'phyar //
analyzed: be con ljang nag dbyug tho 'phyar //
translated: Daṇḍa is dark green and holds a club.

original: srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung //
analyzed: srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung //
translated: Rākṣasi is red and drinks blood from a skull cup.

original: za ba ljang nag ba su 'dren //
analyzed: za ba ljang nag ba su 'dren //
translated: Bhūcarī is dark green and holds a bāsu.

original: dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'chang //
analyzed: dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'chang //
translated: Rati is red and holds a katara.

original: stobs chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma //
analyzed: stobs chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma //
translated: Mahābala is white and holds a plow.

original: rdo rje ser mo spu gri gcod //
analyzed: rdo rje ser mo spu gri gcod //
translated: Vajrā is yellow and wields a razor.

original: 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs //
analyzed: 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs //
translated: Desire is red, drawing a bow and arrow.

original: nor srung dkar mo bum pa 'dzin //
analyzed: nor srung dkar mo bum pa 'dzin //
translated: Wealth-protector is white, holding a vase.

original: @262a *// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar //
analyzed: @262a *// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar //
translated: Wind-god is blue, waving a banner.

original: gsod byed dkar mo ral gri so //
analyzed: gsod byed dkar mo ral gri so //
translated: Destroyer is white, holding a sword.

original: me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'chang //
analyzed: me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'chang //
translated: Fire is red, holding a forked tree.🔽Pig-face is black, holding a noose.

original: phag mo nag mo che zhags can; ;rgan byad dmar mo zhing chung za //
analyzed: phag mo nag mo che zhags can; ;rgan byad dmar mo zhing chung za //
translated: Old-woman is red, eating a small corpse.

original: sna tshogs dkar mo thod khrag 'thung //
analyzed: sna tshogs dkar mo thod khrag 'thung //
translated: Diverse is white, drinking blood from a skull-cup.

original: chu lha dmar ser sbrul zhags 'dzin //🔽rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin //
analyzed: chu lha dmar ser sbrul zhags 'dzin // rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin //
translated: Water-spirit is orange, holding a snake-noose.🔽Vajra is black, holding a hook.

original: rdo rje ser mo ra mgo zhags //🔽rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sngom //
analyzed: rdo rje ser mo ra mgo zhags // rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sngom //

analyzed: gnas bzhi dangs ma 'byung ba ste //

analyzed: khog pa dur khrod gzhal yas khang //

analyzed: cod pan nyi zla padmar bcas //

analyzed: rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang //

analyzed: rang byung tsitta'i 'khor lo na //

analyzed: thig le ye shes lnga bdag nyid //

analyzed: ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ros //

analyzed: 'byung bzhi dvangs ma yum nyid de //

analyzed: zla ba nyi ma gnas pa yi // shr'a ri tsitta'i thig le la //

analyzed: nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang // spyod yul bde bar bsgyur ba dang // thig le so sor dgod par nus //

analyzed: bsdus pas thig le chen po nyid //

analyzed: tha mal 'joms pas khro mor snang //

original: gnas kyi thig le rtsar bcas pa //
analyzed: gnas kyi thig le rtsar bcas pa //

analyzed: phra men nyid du shes par bya //

analyzed: gnas bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo nyid de //

analyzed: sgal chigs la brten bde ba'i bcud //

analyzed: 'phro zhing sdud pa dbang phyug ma //

analyzed: spyod yul dag pas mang du bshad //

analyzed: zla ba nyi ma la brten te //

analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi lam brgyud de //

analyzed: nyi ma zla ba dus gcig 'char //

analyzed: thob dang goms pa'i rang bzhin las //

original: zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur bas //
analyzed: zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur bas //
translated: Since one is free from the conception of attachment,

original: rang dbang med pa'i rtags 'byung ste //
analyzed: rang dbang med pa'i rtags 'byung ste //
translated: the sign of being powerless arises.

original: sbar zhing mnan pa'i cho ga bya //
analyzed: sbar zhing mnan pa'i cho ga bya //

original: snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos //
analyzed: snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos //

original: bde ba chen po'i thig ler brtan //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i thig ler brtan //
translated: are stabilized in the bindu of great bliss.

original: nyi ma'i snying po lta ba ltar //
analyzed: nyi ma'i snying po lta ba ltar //
translated: Like looking at the essence of the sun,

original: bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don //
analyzed: bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don //
translated: the meaning of nonseeing is seen.

original: ma lus bde chen rgyan du snang //
analyzed: ma lus bde chen rgyan du snang //

original: de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad //
analyzed: de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad //

analyzed: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi // ji snyed ma lus chos bstan pa //
translated: are taught as saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.

original: rang byung ye shes chen po ste //
analyzed: rang byung ye shes chen po ste //
translated: They are the great, self-originated pristine consciousness,

original: de nyid dngos po sna tshogs mchog /
analyzed: de nyid dngos po sna tshogs mchog /
