original: ji snyed brtan g-yo snang ba'i chos //
analyzed: ji snyed brtan g-yo snang ba'i chos //

original: chen po rags pa gnas pa'i chos //
analyzed: chen po rags pa gnas pa'i chos //
translated: are the phenomena that abide as the coarse great one.

original: ma lus kun la mthun snang ba //
analyzed: ma lus kun la mthun snang ba //

original: rang byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: rang byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid //

original: de dag gnod rnam ma skyes pa'i //
analyzed: de dag gnod rnam ma skyes pa'i //

original: rdo rje shes rab stong nyid de //
analyzed: rdo rje shes rab stong nyid de //

original: gang yang dngos min ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: gang yang dngos min ngo bo nyid //

original: shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin no //

original: ji snyed nam mkha'i mthar thug pa //
analyzed: ji snyed nam mkha'i mthar thug pa //

original: rang byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs //
analyzed: rang byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs //

original: ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid //🔽dpag med mthun par @265a *//
analyzed: ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid // dpag med mthun par @265a *//

original: snang ba ste //
analyzed: snang ba ste //
translated: They appear in common to all,

original: me long dang ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: me long dang ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: the nature of the clear mirror.

original: sna tshogs gzugs dang 'brel ba bzhin //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs dang 'brel ba bzhin //

original: ma lus rigs pa'i thig le las //
analyzed: ma lus rigs pa'i thig le las //

original: ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang //
analyzed: ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang //

original: ji snyed rab 'byams ma lus pa'i //🔽'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang // zin dang ma zin gnyis ka'i sgra //
analyzed: ji snyed rab 'byams ma lus pa'i // 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang // zin dang ma zin gnyis ka'i sgra //
translated: All-inclusive, infinite, and limitless🔽Samsara, nirvana, both, and neither

original: nges pa dang ni ma nges pa'i //
analyzed: nges pa dang ni ma nges pa'i //
translated: Are the sounds of the definite and the indefinite.

original: 'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: 'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa //

analyzed: brjod dang bsam dang 'phrul pa dang // byin rlabs mtha' yas rang snang ba //

original: byang chub sems kyi gsung mchog ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi gsung mchog ste //

original: nam mkha'i sgra dang brag ca ltar //
analyzed: nam mkha'i sgra dang brag ca ltar //

original: rang rgyud med pa'i rig pa nyid //🔽bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed pa //
analyzed: rang rgyud med pa'i rig pa nyid // bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed pa //
translated: The vidyā that lacks its own continuum

original: ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: Is the maṇḍala of speech of all-inclusive thoughts.

original: rang rgyud brtan po min par gnas //
analyzed: rang rgyud brtan po min par gnas //
translated: It exists without a stable continuum.

original: gang du nam mkha' mtha' klas par //
analyzed: gang du nam mkha' mtha' klas par //
translated: Wherever space is limitless,

original: bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar //
analyzed: bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar //
translated: The eons are limitless.

original: nam mkha'i char dang chu bur dang // sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar //
analyzed: nam mkha'i char dang chu bur dang // sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar //
translated: Like rain in the sky, bubbles, clouds, waves, and masses of water.🔽Wisdom, bliss, suffering,🔽certainty, uncertainty, sublime,🔽inferior, attachment, detachment,🔽grasping, clinging, and non-clinging,

original: ye shes bde dang sdug bsngal dang // nges dang ma nges dam pa dang // dman dang chags dang chags bral dang // zin dang zhen dang ma zhen dang // rnam pa rnam med brtags pa'i chos //
analyzed: ye shes bde dang sdug bsngal dang // nges dang ma nges dam pa dang // dman dang chags dang chags bral dang // zin dang zhen dang ma zhen dang // rnam pa rnam med brtags pa'i chos //
translated: aspects and non-aspects are imputed phenomena.

original: dran rtog rig pa gang yang rung //
analyzed: dran rtog rig pa gang yang rung //
translated: Any kind of awareness, thought, or cognition,

original: ma lus rig pa rang snang ba //
analyzed: ma lus rig pa rang snang ba //
translated: all awareness is self-appearing.

original: snga ma dran pa'i rnam pa 'am //
analyzed: snga ma dran pa'i rnam pa 'am //
translated: The aspects of past memories

original: rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar //
analyzed: rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar //

original: sna @265b tshogs snang yang rang rgyud min //
analyzed: sna @265b tshogs snang yang rang rgyud min //
translated: Although various appearances occur, they are not one's continuum.

original: gang yang rang rgyud kun bral ba'i //
analyzed: gang yang rang rgyud kun bral ba'i //
translated: All that is free from one's continuum

original: ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams //
analyzed: ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams //
translated: are explained as the maṇḍala of everything.

original: rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te //🔽thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
analyzed: rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
translated: Since there is no continuum, they are reflections.🔽The reflection maṇḍala of the nondual method and wisdom

original: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub //
translated: is spontaneously present.

original: rang byung ye shes skye 'gag med //
analyzed: rang byung ye shes skye 'gag med //
translated: Self-originated pristine consciousness is unborn and unceasing.

original: ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs //
analyzed: ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs //

original: rnam pa mthar thug med pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam pa mthar thug med pa nyid /

original: ;yon tan lhun grub rang snang bas //
analyzed: ;yon tan lhun grub rang snang bas //
translated: The qualities are naturally manifest and spontaneously present,

original: de yi brnyan pa rang bzhin 'char //
analyzed: de yi brnyan pa rang bzhin 'char //

original: mtha' bral rang byung dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: mtha' bral rang byung dkyil 'khor ni //

original: cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir //
analyzed: cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir //

original: yang dag brtag par mi gnas pas //
analyzed: yang dag brtag par mi gnas pas //
translated: Since it does not abide in an authentic investigation,

original: ma lus gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor shar //
analyzed: ma lus gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor shar //

original: bde chen rang byung lhun grub nyid //
analyzed: bde chen rang byung lhun grub nyid //

original: yon tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu ltar //
analyzed: yon tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu ltar //
translated: Like a gem that is perfect in its qualities,

original: dpag med chos su snang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: dpag med chos su snang ba'i phyir //
translated: Since it appears as immeasurable phenomena,

original: bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te //
translated: It is the reflection of great bliss.

original: skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i //🔽gdul bya mtho dman rig pa la //
analyzed: skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i // gdul bya mtho dman rig pa la //
translated: For the sake of those to be tamed, pure and impure,

original: rig spyad spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rig spyad spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to generate enthusiasm in those with awareness,

original: dang po nas bzung mthar thug par //
analyzed: dang po nas bzung mthar thug par //
translated: From the beginning until the end,

original: rang rang bsam bde bzhin du //
analyzed: rang rang bsam bde bzhin du //
translated: In accordance with the happiness of each individual’s thoughts,

original: de dag ngo la de ltar snang //
analyzed: de dag ngo la de ltar snang //

original: gzugs brnyan phyi yi rim pa ste //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan phyi yi rim pa ste //

original: thun mong yul du gyur phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong yul du gyur phyir ro //
translated: Is the common domain.

original: ma lus tha dad med pa yi //
analyzed: ma lus tha dad med pa yi //
translated: All are not separate.

original: phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs pa'i lus //
analyzed: phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs pa'i lus //

original: bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i gnas //
analyzed: bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i gnas //

original: mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos //
analyzed: mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos //

original: rang nyid bde ba chen po'i @266a *//
analyzed: rang nyid bde ba chen po'i @266a *//

original: gzugs // dvangs snyigs 'brel ba'i nus mthu las //🔽zag pa yod dang med pa yi //
analyzed: gzugs // dvangs snyigs 'brel ba'i nus mthu las // zag pa yod dang med pa yi //
translated: From the power of the connection of the pure and impure,🔽the phenomena of the two entities,

original: dngos po gnyis kyi chos su snang //
analyzed: dngos po gnyis kyi chos su snang //
translated: with and without outflows, appear.

original: rgyu yi thig le'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: rgyu yi thig le'i rang bzhin la //

original: nus pa'i khyad par so so yis //
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par so so yis //

original: 'byung ba dang ni yum nyid dang // bde ba chen po la sogs pa //
analyzed: 'byung ba dang ni yum nyid dang // bde ba chen po la sogs pa //

original: thig le nus pa'i stobs las snang //
analyzed: thig le nus pa'i stobs las snang //

original: ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid //
analyzed: ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid //

original: thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i gzugs //
analyzed: thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i gzugs //

original: rtsa yig bye brag bcas pa ni //
analyzed: rtsa yig bye brag bcas pa ni //
translated: The individual nāḍī syllables

original: bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba //
analyzed: bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba //

original: ma lus rten can dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: ma lus rten can dkyil 'khor nyid //

original: ma lus snod bcud kun tu snang //
analyzed: ma lus snod bcud kun tu snang //

original: thabs chen gsang ba'i rim pa nyid //
analyzed: thabs chen gsang ba'i rim pa nyid //

original: khams bzhil brten thig le nyid //
analyzed: khams bzhil brten thig le nyid //
translated: is the bindu itself, based on the four elements.

original: g-yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang thim //
analyzed: g-yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang thim //

original: bye brag gsum las brgyud pa yis //
analyzed: bye brag gsum las brgyud pa yis //

original: gru dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la //
analyzed: gru dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la //

original: zhugs dang 'thung ba'i spyod yul lam //🔽me long dang ba'i ri bo yi //
analyzed: zhugs dang 'thung ba'i spyod yul lam // me long dang ba'i ri bo yi //
translated: And the object of the experience of entering and drinking🔽Are like the object of the experience of entering and drinking🔽The water of a mirage.🔽Like going to the peak of a clear mountain

original: rtser phyin ma lus bltas pa ltar //
analyzed: rtser phyin ma lus bltas pa ltar //
translated: And seeing everything,

original: bde chen gzugs brnyan nyid du snang //
analyzed: bde chen gzugs brnyan nyid du snang //
translated: The reflection of great bliss appears.🔽The bindu of the four stages

original: rim pa bzhi yi thig le nyid //
analyzed: rim pa bzhi yi thig le nyid //

analyzed: bde ba'i 'du byed gang bskul ba // gnas bzhi'i thig le'i bye brag gsal //

original: mu tig phreng ba brgyus pa ltar //
analyzed: mu tig phreng ba brgyus pa ltar //

analyzed: 'dzag dang 'bar ba'i thig le nyid // til 'bru 'bras bu smin pa ltar //
translated: The bindu of dripping and blazing🔽Is like a sesame seed with a ripened fruit.

original: ma lus til gyi phung po ltar //
analyzed: ma lus til gyi phung po ltar //
translated: Like a heap of sesame seeds,

original: thig @266b le'i lus su gnas pa yin //
analyzed: thig @266b le'i lus su gnas pa yin //

original: nyams myong gsal bar 'bar ba'i tshe //
analyzed: nyams myong gsal bar 'bar ba'i tshe //
translated: When the experience blazes clearly,🔽There is trembling, perspiration, and the hairs stand at attention;

original: 'dar dang rdul dang pa spu ldang // 'phar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gar //
analyzed: 'dar dang rdul dang pa spu ldang // 'phar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gar //

original: rnam par rol ba'i chogs su snang //
analyzed: rnam par rol ba'i chogs su snang //
translated: The assembly of the display appears.

original: snang srid bde ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: snang srid bde ba chen po nyid //

original: tha mal nub cing brtan gyur na //
analyzed: tha mal nub cing brtan gyur na //

original: thig le nam mkha'i stobs kyis sbyang //
analyzed: thig le nam mkha'i stobs kyis sbyang //

original: rtse gcig nam mkha'i mthong stobs kyis //
analyzed: rtse gcig nam mkha'i mthong stobs kyis //

original: thig le stong par thim pa na //
analyzed: thig le stong par thim pa na //

original: ye shes nam mkha'i gzungs su nges //
analyzed: ye shes nam mkha'i gzungs su nges //

original: snang srid snod bcud ma lus kun //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud ma lus kun //

original: bde chen rig pa'i gzugs brnyan du //
analyzed: bde chen rig pa'i gzugs brnyan du //

original: rgya mtsho mjings nas bltas pa ltar //
analyzed: rgya mtsho mjings nas bltas pa ltar //

original: ma lus de ltar snang ba yin //
analyzed: ma lus de ltar snang ba yin //
translated: everything appears in that way.🔽The experience of vidyā and the pure field

original: rig pas nyams su myong ba dang // spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad //
analyzed: rig pas nyams su myong ba dang // spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad //
translated: are explained as inner.

original: rang byung bde ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: rang byung bde ba chen po nyid //
translated: The self-originated great bliss🔽is the secret person to be tamed

original: gsang ba'i gang zag gdul ba dang // gsang ba'i nyams myong mngon bstan phyir //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gang zag gdul ba dang // gsang ba'i nyams myong mngon bstan phyir //

original: thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi //

original: cho ga'i bya ba kun ldan cing //
analyzed: cho ga'i bya ba kun ldan cing //

original: dbang bskur byin brlabs sbyangs pa dang // brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu dang // drug cu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis //
analyzed: dbang bskur byin brlabs sbyangs pa dang // brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu dang // drug cu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis //

original: chu skyes snying po rdo rje can //
analyzed: chu skyes snying po rdo rje can //
translated: The vajra-holder of the essence of the lotus,

original: nyi ma me shel 'od 'byung ba //
analyzed: nyi ma me shel 'od 'byung ba //

original: rang byung rlung gi phyag rgyas bskyod //
analyzed: rang byung rlung gi phyag rgyas bskyod //

original: nor bu chu 'dzag rang dbang med //
analyzed: nor bu chu 'dzag rang dbang med //

original: ma lus rig pa'i thig ler bsdus //
analyzed: ma lus rig pa'i thig ler bsdus //

original: rgyu ba'i rlung ni chad pa na //
analyzed: rgyu ba'i rlung ni chad pa na //

original: rig pa stong pa'i thig ler thim //
analyzed: rig pa stong pa'i thig ler thim //

original: aa ta @267a *//
analyzed: aa ta @267a *//
translated: A ta la

original: la rten thig le'i rim //
analyzed: la rten thig le'i rim //
translated: The stage of the bindu is based on that.

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature of the moving and unmoving

original: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par snang //
analyzed: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par snang //

original: gsang ba'i thig le la brten pas //
analyzed: gsang ba'i thig le la brten pas //

original: ma lus bde chen 'khor los bsgyur //
analyzed: ma lus bde chen 'khor los bsgyur //

analyzed: lus kyi thig le dang por te // de nas rig pa'i thig le yin //

original: de nas ye shes thig le nyid //
analyzed: de nas ye shes thig le nyid //

original: tha ma chos nyid thig ler thim //
analyzed: tha ma chos nyid thig ler thim //

original: de nas dus gsum 'du 'bral med //
analyzed: de nas dus gsum 'du 'bral med //

original: bde chen nam mkha'i khams nyid de //
analyzed: bde chen nam mkha'i khams nyid de //

original: zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi //
analyzed: zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi //
translated: It is profound and does not move.

original: rang rgyud zhen chags kun bral ba'i //
analyzed: rang rgyud zhen chags kun bral ba'i //
translated: Free from all attachment to one’s continuum,

original: bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan shar //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan shar //
translated: The reflection of great bliss arises.

original: ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan te //
analyzed: ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan te //
translated: The reflection of the pervader that is not realized

original: rtog par nyams myong gzugs brnyan nyid //
analyzed: rtog par nyams myong gzugs brnyan nyid //
translated: is the reflection of experience in the imagination.🔽This reflection of the pristine consciousness that has reached the end🔽is not the domain of those who are inferior,

original: mthar phyin ye shes gzugs brnyan 'di; ;dman dang yan lag ma tshang dang // dbang dang man ngag med pa dang // dka' thub can dang ma smen dang // skal med yal ba'i yul min pas //
analyzed: mthar phyin ye shes gzugs brnyan 'di; ;dman dang yan lag ma tshang dang // dbang dang man ngag med pa dang // dka' thub can dang ma smen dang // skal med yal ba'i yul min pas //
translated: those who lack limbs, those who lack empowerment and intimate instructions,🔽those who are ascetics, those who are not mature, and those who are unfortunate.

original: gsang ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid //
translated: This is the sublime, great secret of secrets.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Next, I will explain

original: lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid //

original: tha mal brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: tha mal brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to generate enthusiasm in the ordinary,

original: cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya //
analyzed: cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya //
translated: the extensive rite will be explained.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'dod kyang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'dod kyang //
translated: Although one wishes to realize the great maṇḍala,

original: ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la //
analyzed: ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la //
translated: since it does not manifest just as it is,

original: lhag par 'di yis rtogs gyur pas //
analyzed: lhag par 'di yis rtogs gyur pas //
translated: one realizes it through this superior [maṇḍala].

original: lhag pa zhes ni bstan @267b pa yin //
analyzed: lhag pa zhes ni bstan @267b pa yin //
translated: Therefore, it is called “superior.”

original: gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas //
analyzed: gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas //
translated: Since it illustrates something to someone,

original: lhag par mtshon pa nye ba dang // gang la brten te gang bsgrubs pa //
analyzed: lhag par mtshon pa nye ba dang // gang la brten te gang bsgrubs pa //
translated: Especially when the representation is close,🔽and when something is accomplished in dependence on something else,

original: lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir //
translated: it is accomplished quickly.

original: 'dis ni lhag pa nyid du brjod //
analyzed: 'dis ni lhag pa nyid du brjod //
translated: This is what is called “special.”

original: gang las gang de thabs 'di yis //
analyzed: gang las gang de thabs 'di yis //
translated: From whatever, by whatever means,

original: mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o //
translated: it is especially manifest, it is special.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of all the victors🔽are the means by which they manifest,

original: thabs dang gang gis mngon ston cing; ;dngos gzhi nyi ma yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: thabs dang gang gis mngon ston cing; ;dngos gzhi nyi ma yin pa'i phyir //
translated: and because the main part is the sun,

original: gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan pa yin //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan pa yin //
translated: they are taught to be reflections.

original: gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis //
analyzed: gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis //
translated: By the means that are relied upon,

original: de nyid 'dra bar snang ba ltar //
analyzed: de nyid 'dra bar snang ba ltar //
translated: just as they appear to be similar,

original: ma mthong mos pa'i gdul bya la //
analyzed: ma mthong mos pa'i gdul bya la //
translated: to those who are not seeing but are devoted disciples,

original: de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de //
translated: those similar means

original: dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no //
translated: are not real, but because they are similar, they are reflections.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: They are the nature of all the victors.🔽The five forms of self-originated pristine consciousness,

original: dpag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i; ;ye shes rang byung lnga yi gzugs //
analyzed: dpag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i; ;ye shes rang byung lnga yi gzugs //
translated: the spontaneous perfection of immeasurable pristine consciousness,

original: zag med gdul bya'i ngo la snang //
analyzed: zag med gdul bya'i ngo la snang //
translated: appear to the face of the taintless disciple.

original: de yi yon tan gzugs brnyan gyis //
analyzed: de yi yon tan gzugs brnyan gyis //
translated: The reflection of their qualities

original: zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la //
analyzed: zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la //
translated: For individuals with contaminated interest,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa nyid //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa nyid //
translated: The forms of body, speech, and mind

original: 'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: 'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs brnyan no //
translated: Are reflected in a likeness, which is the reflected image.

original: gang phyir chos dbyings ngo bo la //
analyzed: gang phyir chos dbyings ngo bo la //
translated: Because in the essence of the dharmadhatu

original: tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang //
analyzed: tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang //
translated: There are no distinctions or divisions,

original: mos dang drag po'i dbang gyur te //
analyzed: mos dang drag po'i dbang gyur te //
translated: But due to the power of intense interest,

original: gang gis gang de mi 'dul bas //
analyzed: gang gis gang de mi 'dul bas //

original: thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i phyir //
translated: Because compassion pervades all,

original: longs spyod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan //🔽zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can //
analyzed: longs spyod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan // zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can //
translated: The enjoyment and emanation mandalas are taught.🔽For those with attachment and pride,

original: thabs dang drag @268a *//
analyzed: thabs dang drag @268a *//
translated: The methods and wrathful

original: pos tshar gcad phyir //
analyzed: pos tshar gcad phyir //

original: de ltar so sor 'tsham pa ste //
analyzed: de ltar so sor 'tsham pa ste //

original: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis su bshad //
analyzed: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis su bshad //

original: gang du bkra shis yid 'ong ba'i //
analyzed: gang du bkra shis yid 'ong ba'i //
translated: Wherever it is auspicious and pleasing,

original: steng 'og phyogs bzhi bar mtshams dag /
analyzed: steng 'og phyogs bzhi bar mtshams dag /
translated: Above, below, in the four directions, and in the intermediate directions,

original: legs pas yid 'od bar chad med //
analyzed: legs pas yid 'od bar chad med //
translated: With excellent and pleasing unobstructed

original: phyi nang ri bo dgon pa'i mchog /
analyzed: phyi nang ri bo dgon pa'i mchog /

original: rang gis gzhi legs brtags la //
analyzed: rang gis gzhi legs brtags la //

original: pra dang nyams kyi ltas brtags la //
analyzed: pra dang nyams kyi ltas brtags la //

original: ma dag mtshan ngan spangs byas la //
analyzed: ma dag mtshan ngan spangs byas la //

original: dag cing nyams dga' blang bar bya //
analyzed: dag cing nyams dga' blang bar bya //

original: sa gzhi byin brlabs bkra shis pa //
analyzed: sa gzhi byin brlabs bkra shis pa //

original: gal te rtsod pa zhi bya'i phyir //
analyzed: gal te rtsod pa zhi bya'i phyir //

original: snang dang mi snang bdag po la //
analyzed: snang dang mi snang bdag po la //

original: mgu bas bar chad med par bslang //
analyzed: mgu bas bar chad med par bslang //

analyzed: gang de dbang du bya ba'i phyir //

analyzed: cho ga'i yan lag kun brtsams te //

analyzed: mchod dang mnyes pas tshim byas la //

analyzed: thun mod skyon bsal dag byas nas //

analyzed: mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing // dngos grub myur zhing nyams dga' ba'i //

original: phyi nang dag pa chen por sbyang //
analyzed: phyi nang dag pa chen por sbyang //

original: rang bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos //
analyzed: rang bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos //

original: gdod nas ma bcos gnas pa la //
analyzed: gdod nas ma bcos gnas pa la //

analyzed: lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med pas; ;lha dang gzhal yas ngo bor brlag /

analyzed: gang de'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir //

original: ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad de //
analyzed: ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad de //

original: las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas //
analyzed: las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas //

analyzed: dngos grub gter du ming gis gzung //

analyzed: gang phyir bshad pa'i cho ga yis //

analyzed: ma dag pa dang ngan pa dag /

original: rtogs dang ting 'dzin cho ga yis //
analyzed: rtogs dang ting 'dzin cho ga yis //

analyzed: mnyam pas re dogs med par gnas //

original: dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin //

original: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i tshad //

analyzed: mdzes shing legs par byas nas ni //

analyzed: gang dang 'brel ba'i cho ga brtsam //

analyzed: ras bal dur khrod rgyu las byas //

analyzed: byin rlabs lnga dang sku gsung thugs //

analyzed: thim pas ye shes thig skud de //

analyzed: gsang ba'i 'phro 'du de bzhin no //

analyzed: lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya //

analyzed: gser dang dngul dang bee d'urya //

analyzed: padma aandri n'i la nyid //

analyzed: ye shes rin chen phyi nang med //

analyzed: dag pa'i ngo bor blta bar bya //

analyzed: thod pa sna lnga sna gsum dang // thod skam rtsig pa'i rim pa bzhin //

original: tshangs dang lha dbang la brten pa //

analyzed: phyi nang rgyu 'bras gdug pa dag /

original: dur khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas //
analyzed: dur khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas //
translated: The ground of the charnel ground is with blood.

original: skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad //
analyzed: skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad //
translated: The eight directions are men impaled on stakes.

original: rakta'i mtsho brgyad rab rlabs 'khyil //
analyzed: rakta'i mtsho brgyad rab rlabs 'khyil //
translated: There are eight pools of blood with turbulent waves.

original: thod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung //
analyzed: thod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung //
translated: The charnel ground wind blows through the garland of skulls.

original: 'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'od ldan //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'od ldan //
translated: It has terrifying sounds and the light of fire.

original: zhing 'phen phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas //
analyzed: zhing 'phen phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas //
translated: The eight directions are the flung entrails.

original: lha chen thod pa spubs steng na //
analyzed: lha chen thod pa spubs steng na //
translated: On the top of the skull of the great god

original: tsitta'i tog las 'od zer 'phro //
analyzed: tsitta'i tog las 'od zer 'phro //
translated: is a light ray from the crest of the heart.

original: he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: It is the maṇḍala of Heruka.

original: ma lus bri zhing bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ma lus bri zhing bsgom par bya //
translated: One should draw and meditate on it completely.

original: ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas //
analyzed: ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas //
translated: It fulfills the hopes of all migrating beings.

original: rin chen phreng dang rgyan du ldan //
analyzed: rin chen phreng dang rgyan du ldan //
translated: It is endowed with a garland of jewels and ornaments.

original: mi 'jigs stobs sogs @270a *//
analyzed: mi 'jigs stobs sogs @270a *//
translated: Endowed with the powers of fearlessness,

original: kun ldan pas //
analyzed: kun ldan pas //
translated: and so forth,

original: stobs ldan theg par gnas pa yin //
analyzed: stobs ldan theg par gnas pa yin //
translated: they abide in the powerful vehicle.

original: spyod pa skyon gyis ma gos pas //
analyzed: spyod pa skyon gyis ma gos pas //
translated: Because their conduct is untainted by faults,

original: padma 'bar bar mdzes par snang //
analyzed: padma 'bar bar mdzes par snang //
translated: they appear beautifully, like blazing lotuses.

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas //
translated: Because method and wisdom are nondual,

original: nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: they sit on beautiful seats of sun and moon.

original: bde chen don las mi 'da' bas //
analyzed: bde chen don las mi 'da' bas //
translated: Because they never transgress the meaning of great bliss,

original: 'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs //
analyzed: 'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs //
translated: they sit in the manner of entwined and passionate union.

original: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs //
analyzed: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs //
translated: The complete body, speech, qualities, activities, and mind

original: yongs rdzogs sku yi rgyan du gnas //🔽lam dang byang chub yan lag rnams //
analyzed: yongs rdzogs sku yi rgyan du gnas // lam dang byang chub yan lag rnams //
translated: abide as ornaments of the body.🔽Because the path and the limbs of awakening are complete,

original: rdzogs phyir phreng ba la sogs tshul //
analyzed: rdzogs phyir phreng ba la sogs tshul //
translated: they are like garlands and so forth.

original: thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas //
analyzed: thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas //
translated: Because compassion does not abandon samsara,

original: chu srin klu phrug bzung ba bzhin //
analyzed: chu srin klu phrug bzung ba bzhin //
translated: it is like a makara holding a baby naga.

original: thugs rje bar chad mi mnga' bas //
analyzed: thugs rje bar chad mi mnga' bas //
translated: Because compassion is unimpeded,

original: 'brel ba bar chad med par gnas //
analyzed: 'brel ba bar chad med par gnas //
translated: it abides in an uninterrupted connection.

original: brtson 'grus 'khor pa spong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: brtson 'grus 'khor pa spong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because diligence abandons samsara,

original: ri dvags dag ni mnyan par gnas //
analyzed: ri dvags dag ni mnyan par gnas //
translated: it is like a deer sitting in a boat.

original: zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs pas //
analyzed: zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs pas //
translated: Because the uncontaminated eyes see everything,

original: dge sdig spyan gyis gzigs par bstan //
analyzed: dge sdig spyan gyis gzigs par bstan //
translated: It is taught that the eyes see virtue and nonvirtue.

original: ma lus zil gnon stobs rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: ma lus zil gnon stobs rdzogs phyir //
translated: Because the power of subduing everything is perfected,

original: bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan //
analyzed: bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan //
translated: It is taught as the garuḍa.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas shing //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas shing //
translated: Having turned the wheel of Dharma,

original: nyon mongs tshad pa'i gdung sel bas //
analyzed: nyon mongs tshad pa'i gdung sel bas //
translated: The torment of the afflictions is removed,

original: thugs rje gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan //
analyzed: thugs rje gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan //
translated: So it is taught as the parasol of compassion.

original: ma lus gcig tu 'dus pas na //
analyzed: ma lus gcig tu 'dus pas na //
translated: Because everything is gathered into one,

original: tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste //
analyzed: tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste //
translated: It is the blazing light rays of a thousand suns.

original: gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan //
analyzed: gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan //
translated: It is taught for the sake of the thoughts of those to be tamed.

original: lha rnams so @270b so'i rnam pa ni //
analyzed: lha rnams so @270b so'i rnam pa ni //
translated: The aspects of the individual deities🔽Are the various colors, the modes of sitting,

original: sku mdog sna tshogs bzhugs tshul dang // gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas //
analyzed: sku mdog sna tshogs bzhugs tshul dang // gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas //
translated: The seats, the hand implements, and the ornaments.

original: pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams //
analyzed: pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams //
translated: The male and female modes🔽Are the modes of the view of the tathāgatas

original: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang // gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis //🔽gtso 'khor phyi nang lta tshul gyis //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang // gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis // gtso 'khor phyi nang lta tshul gyis //
translated: And the modes of seeing those to be tamed.🔽The modes of sitting are taught

original: bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor bstan //
analyzed: bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor bstan //
translated: In the outer and inner views of the principal ones and retinue.

original: rang rang snying po gang yin pa //
analyzed: rang rang snying po gang yin pa //
translated: The individual essences

original: kha dog so sor phye nas ni //
analyzed: kha dog so sor phye nas ni //
translated: Are differentiated into individual colors.

original: gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa yi //
analyzed: gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa yi //
translated: In order to explain the maṇḍala of speech,

original: rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya //
translated: one should clearly arrange it in stages.

original: rang rang thugs mtshan gang yin pa //
analyzed: rang rang thugs mtshan gang yin pa //
translated: The individual heart-signs

original: kha dog dbyibs dang bcas pa nyid //
analyzed: kha dog dbyibs dang bcas pa nyid //
translated: have their own colors and shapes.

original: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to explain the maṇḍala of mind,

original: rim pa ji bzhin dgod par bya //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin dgod par bya //
translated: one should arrange it in stages.

original: gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang //
analyzed: gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang //
translated: The maṇḍala that tames the savage

original: dung chen ras chen la sogs pa //
analyzed: dung chen ras chen la sogs pa //
translated: is a great conch, a great cloth, and so on.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid //
translated: The maṇḍala of body, speech, and mind

original: rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod //🔽de bzhin nyid la dmigs med de //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod // de bzhin nyid la dmigs med de //
translated: should be clearly arranged in stages.🔽The non-apprehension of suchness

original: stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid //
analyzed: stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid //
translated: is the emptiness of non-apprehension, awareness itself.

original: gang la rtog dpyod mi gnas pa //
analyzed: gang la rtog dpyod mi gnas pa //
translated: Since there is no abiding in conceptual analysis,

original: chos dbyings de bzhin nyid du bsgom //
analyzed: chos dbyings de bzhin nyid du bsgom //
translated: meditate on the dharmadhātu suchness.

original: bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid //
translated: The two truths are inseparable equality,

original: ye nas khyab kyang ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: ye nas khyab kyang ma rtogs pas //
translated: pervading from the beginning, but not realized.

original: phyogs med snying rje nam mkha' ltar //
analyzed: phyogs med snying rje nam mkha' ltar //
translated: Non-partisan compassion, like space,

original: rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya //🔽rang byung ye shes rnam pas ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya // rang byung ye shes rnam pas ni //
translated: should be meditated upon by the yogi.🔽The seed syllables of the five families

original: yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las //
analyzed: yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las //
translated: are the five pristine consciousnesses.🔽The five pristine consciousnesses🔽are the five mothers.

original: zhen 'dzin sbyangs nas @271a *//
analyzed: zhen 'dzin sbyangs nas @271a *//
translated: Having purified clinging and attachment,

original: yig 'bru yi //
analyzed: yig 'bru yi //
translated: the seed syllables

original: 'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis bskyed //
analyzed: 'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis bskyed //
translated: emanate and reabsorb, gradually generating the five elements.

original: brum gyis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas //
analyzed: brum gyis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas //
translated: The syllable bhrūṃ purifies the nondual light

original: gzhal yas khang ltar yin par bsgom //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang ltar yin par bsgom //
translated: and is meditated on as the immeasurable mansion.

original: rnam pa'i gang yin de dag dang // rang rig sa bon gnyis med las //
analyzed: rnam pa'i gang yin de dag dang // rang rig sa bon gnyis med las //
translated: From the nonduality of the seed syllable of one’s vidyā

original: 'dres pas gang yin gtso bo nyid //
analyzed: 'dres pas gang yin gtso bo nyid //
translated: and the seed syllable, the principal one is generated.

original: bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas //
analyzed: bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas //
translated: Having generated and conferred empowerment,

original: 'khor yang mi phyed 'dres par bsgom //
analyzed: 'khor yang mi phyed 'dres par bsgom //
translated: the retinue is also meditated on as inseparable and mixed.

original: yongs rdzogs smin cing brtas pa la //
analyzed: yongs rdzogs smin cing brtas pa la //
translated: Having fully ripened and increased,

original: dza:h'um bam hos gnyis med de //
analyzed: dza:h'um bam hos gnyis med de //
translated: with jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, they become nondual.

original: 'dod pa mthar thug bar du bsam //
analyzed: 'dod pa mthar thug bar du bsam //
translated: Think that they are satisfied with the desired [offerings] until the end.

original: las kyi bya ba kun zin nas //
analyzed: las kyi bya ba kun zin nas //
translated: Having completed all the activities,🔽the various common offerings

original: thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang // kun bzang mchod pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang // kun bzang mchod pa la sogs pa //
translated: and the Samantabhadra offerings

original: lha mo brgyad dang bcu drug gis //🔽mchod pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya //
analyzed: lha mo brgyad dang bcu drug gis //🔽mchod pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya //
translated: are presented by the eight or sixteen offering goddesses.

original: rin chen rnam lnga rta glang dang // 'bru dang bang mdzod khang khyim dang // bu dang chung ma bran khol dang // gnas ngang zhing dang na bza' dang // rgyan phreng bza' btung longs spyod dang // rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang // mtshe'u dang khron pa lu ma dang //
analyzed: rin chen rnam lnga rta glang dang // 'bru dang bang mdzod khang khyim dang // bu dang chung ma bran khol dang // gnas ngang zhing dang na bza' dang // rgyan phreng bza' btung longs spyod dang // rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang // mtshe'u dang khron pa lu ma dang //
translated: ornaments, garlands, food, drink, enjoyments,🔽ponds, springs, waterfalls,🔽lakes, wells, canals,

original: ri dang de'u dang skyed mos tshal //
analyzed: ri dang de'u dang skyed mos tshal //
translated: mountains, hills, and parks,🔽the outer ring and Mount Meru,🔽and the songs and dances of many beings,

original: khor yug dang lhun po dang // skye bo mang bo bro glu dang // nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi //
analyzed: khor yug dang lhun po dang // skye bo mang bo bro glu dang // nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi //
translated: as well as the sky's expanse,

original: mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par mchod //
analyzed: mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par mchod //
translated: I offer these vast and various offerings.

original: dpa' bo sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
analyzed: dpa' bo sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
translated: The hero's five meats and five amṛtas,🔽the essence, music, appearances,

original: bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang // sna tshogs @271b dri dang byug pa mchog /
analyzed: bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang // sna tshogs @271b dri dang byug pa mchog /
translated: various scents, and supreme ointments,

original: dag cing legs par 'bul bar bya //
analyzed: dag cing legs par 'bul bar bya //
translated: I offer these pure and excellent substances.

original: thar pa la sogs zhing gi mchog /
analyzed: thar pa la sogs zhing gi mchog /
translated: The supreme fields such as Tārā,

original: dngos dang lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: dngos dang lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: through the view, conduct, and samādhi,

original: bsgrub bya ma lus kun bsgral te //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma lus kun bsgral te //
translated: liberate all those to be tamed without exception.

original: rdo rje zhing du bskyed par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje zhing du bskyed par bya //
translated: Generate the vajra realm.

original: lha mo mi mo rig pa mo //
analyzed: lha mo mi mo rig pa mo //
translated: Goddess, human, or knowledge woman,

original: cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin //
analyzed: cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin //
translated: According to one’s own understanding of the ritual procedure,

original: dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis //
translated: By means of the union of the real and the meditative absorption,

original: bde ba chen po rol mo yis //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rol mo yis //
translated: With the play of great bliss,

original: phyi nang nam mkha'i khams bkang ste //
analyzed: phyi nang nam mkha'i khams bkang ste //
translated: Filling the outer, inner, and space elements,🔽With the goddess of jewels, articles,

original: rin chen lha mo yo byad dang // reg pa nyams myong bde ba yis //
analyzed: rin chen lha mo yo byad dang // reg pa nyams myong bde ba yis //
translated: And the bliss of the experience of touch,

original: rgyal sras zhing gi rdul snyed la //
analyzed: rgyal sras zhing gi rdul snyed la //
translated: To the conquerors’ heirs as numerous as atoms in the realm,

original: gnyis med dag pa'i tshul gyis mchod //
analyzed: gnyis med dag pa'i tshul gyis mchod //
translated: Make offerings with the pure method of nonduality.

original: rol mo glu dbyangs bcas pa yis //
analyzed: rol mo glu dbyangs bcas pa yis //
translated: With music and song,

original: dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya //
translated: Praise the stages of the maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis //
translated: With the recitation of the three vajras,

original: mtshan ma legs par snang ba na //🔽sbyang dang byin brlabs dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bstan pa'i cho ga dag /
analyzed: mtshan ma legs par snang ba na // sbyang dang byin brlabs dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bstan pa'i cho ga dag /
translated: When the excellent signs appear,🔽Perform the extensive ritual of the imagination:🔽Purification, consecration, empowerment,

original: rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya //
analyzed: rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya //
translated: Offering, and teaching.

original: dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru //
translated: In the four directions of that maṇḍala,

original: rnam bzhi las kyi me thab la //
analyzed: rnam bzhi las kyi me thab la //
translated: In the four hearth places of activity,

original: dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis //
analyzed: dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis //
translated: At the four times, with one’s own substances,

original: lha bzhi tshul gyis mchod par bya //🔽de nas gnang thob dbang phyug nyid //
analyzed: lha bzhi tshul gyis mchod par bya // de nas gnang thob dbang phyug nyid //
translated: One should make offerings with the four deities.🔽Then, having obtained permission, one should enter the maṇḍala

original: dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas //
translated: and be empowered.

original: thugs rjes 'khor ba bsgral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: thugs rjes 'khor ba bsgral ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to liberate saṃsāra through compassion,

original: skal ldan slob ma gzhug par bya //
analyzed: skal ldan slob ma gzhug par bya //
translated: one should admit the fortunate disciples.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis //🔽sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis // sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che //
translated: The glorious Vajrasattva

original: mngon du mthong zhugs @272a *//🔽bsod nams gang //
analyzed: mngon du mthong zhugs @272a *// bsod nams gang //
translated: manifests the great maṇḍala of body, speech, and mind.🔽The merit of entering here

original: 'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin no //
translated: is just like that.

original: gang du sku gsung thugs ldan pa //
analyzed: gang du sku gsung thugs ldan pa //
translated: Wherever there is body, speech, and mind,

original: gang du mos pas spro bskyed phyir //
analyzed: gang du mos pas spro bskyed phyir //
translated: in order to generate enthusiasm through devotion,

original: rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad de //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad de //
translated: all the victors emanate

original: sgo gsum byin gyis rlob par mdzad //
analyzed: sgo gsum byin gyis rlob par mdzad //
translated: and bless the three doors.

original: rnal 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang //
translated: Also, through the completion of the yoga rite,

original: gdul bya zhi dang bro ba la //
analyzed: gdul bya zhi dang bro ba la //
translated: in order to tame those to be tamed,

original: so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir //
analyzed: so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir //
translated: in order to teach the individual signs,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag /
translated: the forms of body, speech, and mind

original: bris dang brdung dang blugs pa dag /
analyzed: bris dang brdung dang blugs pa dag /
translated: are drawn, carved, or molded

original: so so'i gnas su legs par dgram //
analyzed: so so'i gnas su legs par dgram //
translated: and well arranged in their individual places.

original: ma lus sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: ma lus sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor //
translated: The maṇḍala of body, speech, and mind is complete.

original: 'di las ma gtogs lha gzhan med //
analyzed: 'di las ma gtogs lha gzhan med //
translated: There are no other deities apart from this.

original: gang du dbang dang 'brel ba ni //
analyzed: gang du dbang dang 'brel ba ni //
translated: Wherever there is a connection with empowerment,

original: bco lnga'i rim pas byin brlabs phyir //
analyzed: bco lnga'i rim pas byin brlabs phyir //
translated: because of the consecration of the fifteen stages,

original: bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor la //
translated: the maṇḍala of four and eight

original: yab yum bco brgyad gnas par bya //
analyzed: yab yum bco brgyad gnas par bya //
translated: should be occupied by the eighteen fathers and mothers.

original: bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la //
translated: In the maṇḍala of twelve and sixteen,

original: bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya //
analyzed: bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya //
translated: there should be forty-two.

original: nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la //
analyzed: nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la //
translated: In the twenty or twenty-five,

original: rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod //
translated: the extensive rite should be arranged in stages.

original: 'di dag lugs dang 'bur dang bzo //
analyzed: 'di dag lugs dang 'bur dang bzo //
translated: These are the styles of relief and sculpture,

original: bri dang bsgom pa dag kyang rung //
analyzed: bri dang bsgom pa dag kyang rung //
translated: or they can be drawn or meditated upon.

original: 'di ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'di ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the outer maṇḍala.

original: zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni //🔽thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //🔽sor bzhi mdzub gang la brten te //
analyzed: zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni // thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i // sor bzhi mdzub gang la brten te //
translated: The profound maṇḍala of empowerment🔽is not dependent on the outer aspects

original: phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes 'brang min //
analyzed: phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes 'brang min //
translated: of the four finger lengths or a cubit.

original: mthong dang brtan dang goms pa ni //
analyzed: mthong dang brtan dang goms pa ni //
translated: Seeing, stability, and familiarity

original: rim pa bzhin @272b du gsal bas 'byung //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin @272b du gsal bas 'byung //
translated: occur in sequence, as is clear.

original: brgyud pa lam gyi rim pa yis //
analyzed: brgyud pa lam gyi rim pa yis //
translated: The stages of the path of the lineage

original: mthar phyin nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mthar phyin nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
translated: One will experience the culmination.

original: dbang bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis //
analyzed: dbang bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis //
translated: By the stages of the method of empowerment,

original: byin brlabs man ngag yid ches bya //
analyzed: byin brlabs man ngag yid ches bya //
translated: One should have confidence in the blessings of the intimate instructions.

original: 'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: 'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te //
translated: This is the maṇḍala of empowerment.

original: de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang //
analyzed: de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang //
translated: Likewise, in other contexts,

original: thun mong tshogs la sbyar ba'i phyir //
analyzed: thun mong tshogs la sbyar ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to apply the common accumulation,

original: 'byung lnga rgyu dang bdag nyid dang // mkha' dag byin brlabs so sor gdon //
analyzed: 'byung lnga rgyu dang bdag nyid dang // mkha' dag byin brlabs so sor gdon //
translated: The five elements, the cause, the nature, and the space of the blessing are individually cast.

original: rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the application of one’s ritual,

original: ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Whatever is undertaken will be accomplished.

original: bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad //
analyzed: bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad //
translated: This is explained as the accumulation of merit.

original: gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas //
translated: Moreover, the powerful yogin🔽Should accomplish whatever is desired.

original: gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing whatever is desired,

original: 'chi med tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang // mtshan ma pra yi dkyil 'khor dang // dug 'joms bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang // cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa //
analyzed: 'chi med tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang // mtshan ma pra yi dkyil 'khor dang // dug 'joms bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang // cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa //
translated: The maṇḍala of immortality, the maṇḍala of the signs of the omens, the maṇḍala of the nectar that conquers poison, and the maṇḍala of the magical zombie and so on

original: gang bsgrub don phyir gang bshad pa //
analyzed: gang bsgrub don phyir gang bshad pa //
translated: Are explained for the sake of accomplishing whatever is desired.

original: de nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Is the maṇḍala for accomplishing that.

original: las bzhi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: las bzhi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: The yoga of the deity of the four activities

original: rigs dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi la //
analyzed: rigs dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi la //
translated: Is on a ground that is in accord with the family.

original: thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can //
analyzed: thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can //
translated: The hearth has the characteristics of each one.

original: 'phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad //
analyzed: 'phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad //
translated: The maṇḍala of activity is explained.🔽In order to stabilize the vajra body,🔽The powerful master

original: slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan pas; ;rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir //
analyzed: slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan pas; ;rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir //
translated: Manifests the body, speech, and mind

original: rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa //🔽sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba //
analyzed: rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa // sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba //
translated: In a league, a distance of one krośa, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul te //
analyzed: rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul te //
translated: The field of experience of the fortunate practitioner

original: tshogs @273a *// kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad //
analyzed: tshogs @273a *// kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad //
translated: Is explained to be the maṇḍala of the gaṇacakra.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Next, I will explain

original: mtshan ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: mtshan ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The characteristics of the nature of concepts.🔽Since the objects to be seen are obscured,

original: mthong bya don la sgrib pas na; ;de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad //
analyzed: mthong bya don la sgrib pas na; ;de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad //
translated: The method of purifying them is explained.

original: tha mal zhen pas brtags pa'i don //
analyzed: tha mal zhen pas brtags pa'i don //
translated: The object designated by ordinary clinging

original: lhag pa'i bden gnyis rtogs bsgoms pas //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bden gnyis rtogs bsgoms pas //
translated: Is realized and meditated on as the special two truths.

original: phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa //
analyzed: phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa //
translated: All of the outer and inner universe

original: sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg dkyil 'khor lha yi mtshan ma dag /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg dkyil 'khor lha yi mtshan ma dag /
translated: Burn in the state of enlightened body, speech, and mind.

original: rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dag /
analyzed: rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dag /
translated: All the various appearances of the maṇḍala deities

original: rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid //
analyzed: rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid //
translated: are the self-awareness itself arising as a display.🔽Purify the signs of the bindus

original: mtshan ma thig le'i ngang du sbyang //
analyzed: mtshan ma thig le'i ngang du sbyang //
translated: in the state of the bindus.

original: thig le rim pa'i snang tshul te //
analyzed: thig le rim pa'i snang tshul te //
translated: The way the stages of the bindus appear

original: phyi nang med pa'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: phyi nang med pa'i byang chub sems //
translated: is the bodhicitta that is neither outside nor inside.

original: dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te //
translated: Having purified all things and nonthings,

original: rang rig byang chub sems kyi me //
analyzed: rang rig byang chub sems kyi me //
translated: the fire of self-awareness, bodhicitta,🔽blazes in the ten directions and gathers into the dhātu.

original: phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud; ;rnal 'byor las rung goms pa yis //
analyzed: phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud; ;rnal 'byor las rung goms pa yis //
translated: If one who is familiar with the yoga of activity

original: gzhan don rtsom pa'i don byed na //
analyzed: gzhan don rtsom pa'i don byed na //
translated: wishes to benefit others,

original: dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir //
analyzed: dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir //
translated: first, in order to purify the three misdeeds,

original: rnam gsum khrus kyi rim pa brtsam /🔽gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis //
analyzed: rnam gsum khrus kyi rim pa brtsam / gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis //
translated: begin the three stages of ablution.🔽Having separated from obstacles and hindrances

original: bar chad bgegs dang dbral byas la //
analyzed: bar chad bgegs dang dbral byas la //
translated: with the maṇḍala that tames the savage,

original: bkug bcings bstim la rnal du gzhag /
analyzed: bkug bcings bstim la rnal du gzhag /
translated: gather, bind, and dissolve, and rest in equipoise.

original: bsrung dang byug bdug rgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: bsrung dang byug bdug rgyan gyis brgyan //

original: 'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod de //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod de //
translated: Having arranged all the seeds of saṃsāra,

original: las kyi cho ga thim pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du rim pa yis //
analyzed: las kyi cho ga thim pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du rim pa yis //
translated: and the stages of emanation and gathering of the maṇḍala

original: 'khor ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya //
translated: purify the seed of saṃsāra.

original: de tshe @273b sdong du  gnas bkod de //
analyzed: de tshe @273b sdong du  gnas bkod de //
translated: At that time, the tree is arranged in the site.🔽In each tree,

original: sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi //
analyzed: sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi //
translated: the complete essence of the deities is placed,

original: snying po tshang par gdags pa dang // gsol btab gnang byin sras su bskyed //
analyzed: snying po tshang par gdags pa dang // gsol btab gnang byin sras su bskyed //
translated: the supplication, the permission, and the birth of the son.

original: 'jug dang dbang bskur las rdzogs nas //
analyzed: 'jug dang dbang bskur las rdzogs nas //

original: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te //
analyzed: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te //
translated: the maṇḍala of wrath is the same.

original: las bzhi me yi las byas nas //
analyzed: las bzhi me yi las byas nas //
translated: After the activity of the fire of the four activities is performed,

original: rtog tshogs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i //
analyzed: rtog tshogs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i //
translated: the assembly of concepts is the three inseparable deities.

original: rang rang gnas su dag pa la //
analyzed: rang rang gnas su dag pa la //
translated: Purified in their own places,

original: sbyin sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod //
analyzed: sbyin sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod //
translated: they are offered the fire sacrifice, song, and dance.

original: las kyi bya ba kun zin nas //
analyzed: las kyi bya ba kun zin nas //
translated: After all activities are completed,

original: thig le chen po'i ngang la bsdu //
analyzed: thig le chen po'i ngang la bsdu //
translated: they are gathered into the state of the great bindu.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //🔽byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba // byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te //
translated: Next, I will explain🔽the maṇḍala of bodhicitta.

original: ma lus byang chub sems nyid de //
analyzed: ma lus byang chub sems nyid de //
translated: Bodhicitta is the totality of all.

original: de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya //
analyzed: de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya //
translated: In order to realize that, it is explained.

original: chos rnams ma lus thams cad dang // dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun //
analyzed: chos rnams ma lus thams cad dang // dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun //
translated: and all maṇḍalas without exception

original: tha dad dbye ba mi gnas te //
analyzed: tha dad dbye ba mi gnas te //
translated: do not abide in any division or separation.

original: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: The maṇḍala of bodhicitta

original: rang byung mtho dman med pa yi //
analyzed: rang byung mtho dman med pa yi //
translated: is self-originated, without high or low.

original: sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid //
translated: The body, voice, mind, body, voice, and mind

original: ma lus gzhi rtsa snying po ste //
analyzed: ma lus gzhi rtsa snying po ste //
translated: are the foundation, the root, and the essence of all.

original: rang byung byang chub sems la 'dus //
analyzed: rang byung byang chub sems la 'dus //
translated: They are included in self-originated bodhicitta.

original: de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba //
translated: That is self-knowing luminosity,

original: dngos po ma yin dngos med min //
analyzed: dngos po ma yin dngos med min //
translated: not an entity, not a nonentity,

original: gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min //
analyzed: gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min //
translated: not both, and not nondual.

original: mtha' dbus cha shas kun bral ba'i //
analyzed: mtha' dbus cha shas kun bral ba'i //
translated: Free from all extremes, center, and parts,

original: zab cing yangs la rgya che ba //
analyzed: zab cing yangs la rgya che ba //
translated: it is profound, vast, and extensive.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te //
translated: It is the domain of the tathāgatas,

original: rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pas //
analyzed: rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pas //
translated: not the domain of logicians.

original: gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems //
translated: The secret of secrets is bodhicitta.

original: @274a *// ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
analyzed: @274a *// ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
translated: Amazing! The marvelous Dharma!🔽The secret of all perfect buddhas

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //🔽skye ba med las thams cad skyes //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes //
translated: is the secret of bodhicitta.🔽All arise from the nonarisen;

original: skyes pa nyid las skye ba med //
analyzed: skyes pa nyid las skye ba med //
translated: arising itself is nonarisen.

original: ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
analyzed: ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
translated: Ah! The wondrous, marvelous Dharma,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
translated: The secret of all perfect buddhas,

original: 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag /
analyzed: 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag /
translated: From the unceasing arises the ceasing of all,🔽And in ceasing itself there is no ceasing.

original: 'gag pa nyid ni 'gag pa med; ;ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
analyzed: 'gag pa nyid ni 'gag pa med; ;ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
translated: Ah! The wondrous, marvelous Dharma,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
translated: The secret of all perfect buddhas,

original: gnas pa med las thams cad gnas //
analyzed: gnas pa med las thams cad gnas //
translated: From the nonabiding arises the abiding of all,🔽And in abiding itself there is no abiding.

original: gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med; ;ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
analyzed: gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med; ;ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
translated: Ah! The wondrous, marvelous Dharma,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
translated: The secret of all perfect buddhas,

original: dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs //
analyzed: dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs //
translated: From the nonapprehending arises the apprehending of all,

original: dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med //
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med //
translated: And in apprehending itself there is no apprehending.

original: ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
analyzed: ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
translated: Ah! The wondrous, marvelous Dharma,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
translated: The secret of all perfect buddhas,

original: 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong //
analyzed: 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong //
translated: From the noncoming and nongoing arises coming and going,

original: 'gro 'ong nyid la 'gro 'ong med //
analyzed: 'gro 'ong nyid la 'gro 'ong med //
translated: And in coming and going itself there is no coming and going.

original: ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems //
translated: The unborn awareness is the awakened mind.

original: dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin du //
analyzed: dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin du //
translated: The nature of entities is not an entity.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: The essence of Vajrasattva

original: g-yo dang mi g-yor bcas pa yis //
analyzed: g-yo dang mi g-yor bcas pa yis //
translated: With the moving and unmoving,

original: phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa //
analyzed: phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa //
translated: The entire outer and inner universe,

original: rang byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //🔽rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang // bsam dang dmigs dang goms pa yi //
analyzed: rang byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid // rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang // bsam dang dmigs dang goms pa yi //
translated: Is the very maṇḍala of the self-originated mind.🔽The signs of body, speech, and mind,

original: sku @274b gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang // lha dang lha min gsang ba dang // sha za 'byung po mi 'am ci //
analyzed: sku @274b gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang // lha dang lha min gsang ba dang // sha za 'byung po mi 'am ci //
translated: The gods, demigods, and secret ones,🔽The piśāca, bhūta, kinnara,🔽The kumbhāṇḍa, pretas, and nāgas,🔽All the moving creatures without exception,

original: grul bum yi dvags klu rnams dang // rgyu ba'i srog chags ma lus dang // rtsi shing gel pa 'bras bu dang // phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa //
analyzed: grul bum yi dvags klu rnams dang // rgyu ba'i srog chags ma lus dang // rtsi shing gel pa 'bras bu dang // phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa //
translated: The herbs, bushes, fruits, and so forth,🔽And all that is perfect

original: ma bcos don gyi lha nyid de //
analyzed: ma bcos don gyi lha nyid de //
translated: Are the very deity of the unfabricated meaning.

original: byang chub sems su khyad par med //
analyzed: byang chub sems su khyad par med //
translated: There is no difference in awakened mind.

original: lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang //
analyzed: lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang //
translated: Even though the deity is taught as something other,

original: tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zab //
analyzed: tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zab //
translated: It is merely a conventional term.

original: byang chub sems la gnyis med par //
analyzed: byang chub sems la gnyis med par //
translated: Awakened mind is nondual,

original: rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan //
translated: Taught as singular in the meaning of realization.

original: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang //
translated: The nature of great compassion

original: gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas //
analyzed: gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas //
translated: Is not encountered in the meaning of abiding.

original: ma lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: ma lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa //
translated: The object of compassion is all beings.

original: snying rje byang chub sems yin te //
analyzed: snying rje byang chub sems yin te //
translated: Compassion is the thought of awakening.

original: mi 'gal don du rab sbyor ba //
analyzed: mi 'gal don du rab sbyor ba //
translated: The application of the meaning of non-contradiction

original: kun rdzob byang chub sems su rjod //🔽ji snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos //
analyzed: kun rdzob byang chub sems su rjod // ji snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos //
translated: is called relative bodhicitta.🔽All phenomena, however many there are,

original: ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun //
analyzed: ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun //
translated: all the teachings without exception,

original: byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te //
translated: are the emanations of bodhicitta,

original: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin du //
analyzed: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin du //
translated: just like the emanations of space.

original: sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med //🔽de dag ji ltar gnas kyang rung //
analyzed: sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med // de dag ji ltar gnas kyang rung //
translated: Although they appear various, they are not real.

original: byang chub sems las gzhan min yang //
analyzed: byang chub sems las gzhan min yang //
translated: However they exist, they are not other than bodhicitta.

original: thun mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad //
analyzed: thun mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad //
translated: Because they are the objects of the common [vehicle], they are explained as external.

original: rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: In the maṇḍala of the mudra of one’s body,

original: rang byung 'khor la drug gnas pa //
analyzed: rang byung 'khor la drug gnas pa //
translated: the self-originated retinue resides in six places.

original: g-yo ba yang gis bskyod byed pa //
analyzed: g-yo ba yang gis bskyod byed pa //
translated: The moving one is moved by the vital wind.

original: 'gro ba kun gyi lus la gnas //🔽'phen dang @275a *//
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi lus la gnas // 'phen dang @275a *//
translated: It resides in the body of all migrating beings.

original: sdud pa'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: sdud pa'i rang bzhin can //
translated: It has the nature of exhalation and inhalation.

original: snyigs ma'i dus su'ang bde ba 'char //
analyzed: snyigs ma'i dus su'ang bde ba 'char //
translated: Even in the degenerate age, bliss arises.

original: smin pa gru gsum smad na gnas //
analyzed: smin pa gru gsum smad na gnas //
translated: The ripened one resides below the triangular [bhaga].

original: rnam thar sku gsum rtsa mdud can //
analyzed: rnam thar sku gsum rtsa mdud can //
translated: The three liberations are the knots of the three channels of the three bodies.

original: 'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas //
analyzed: 'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas //
translated: The blazing and the descent and abiding of the bindu

original: rang lus bde chen smin byed pa //
analyzed: rang lus bde chen smin byed pa //
translated: ripen one’s own body into great bliss.

original: de la gang rten bde ba'i gnas //
analyzed: de la gang rten bde ba'i gnas //
translated: The place of bliss that is based on that

original: sangs rgyas rin chen gab tshe la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen gab tshe la //
translated: is the treasure chest of the jewel of buddhahood.

translated: The five stages are the five stages of the path of preparation, the path of seeing, the path of meditation, the uninterrupted path, and the path of liberation.🔽The five moments are the five moments of the path of preparation, the path of seeing, the path of meditation, the uninterrupted path, and the path of liberation.🔽The five elements are the five elements of earth, water, fire, wind, and space.🔽The five powers are the five powers of faith, perseverance, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom.

analyzed: sems lnga rim pas shes par 'gyur //

analyzed: phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du bshad //

translated: The five stages are explained as three:

analyzed: gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel ltar //

analyzed: ting 'dzin rig pa'i pho brang du; ;rgyal tshab skyes bu mtha' dag gis //

original: rig pa'i lha mo na so med //
analyzed: rig pa'i lha mo na so med //

original: rig bral ting 'dzin stobs las grub //
analyzed: rig bral ting 'dzin stobs las grub //
translated: Without the vidyā, they are accomplished through the power of samādhi.

original: de la slob mas nges bstan nas //
analyzed: de la slob mas nges bstan nas //
translated: Having been definitely shown by the disciples,

original: ji ltar chu la ji bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar chu la ji bzhin du //
translated: Just like water,

original: ting 'dzin byin rlabs dbang bskur bas //🔽rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni //
analyzed: ting 'dzin byin rlabs dbang bskur bas // rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni //
translated: Through the blessings of samādhi and the conferral of empowerment,🔽The empowerments free of aspects

original: nyams myong dbang du rang shar te //
analyzed: nyams myong dbang du rang shar te //
translated: Naturally arise in the experience of the empowerments.

original: thob dang brtan dang goms pa yis //🔽'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu //
analyzed: thob dang brtan dang goms pa yis // 'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu //
translated: Through attainment, stability, and familiarity,🔽One benefits oneself and others in hundreds, thousands,

original: 'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs te //
analyzed: 'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs te //
translated: Hundreds of thousands, and so on, of worlds.

original: skad cig nyid la rag las pas //
analyzed: skad cig nyid la rag las pas //
translated: Since one depends on the instant,

original: rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyal @280b por bshad //
analyzed: rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyal @280b por bshad //

original: lam zhugs rigs phyed rtags thob la //
analyzed: lam zhugs rigs phyed rtags thob la //
translated: Having entered the path, having divided the family, and having obtained the signs,

original: slob dpon mthar nye lam gnas pas //
analyzed: slob dpon mthar nye lam gnas pas //
translated: The master, having approached the end, abides on the path.🔽Having measured the vajra grid

original: rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs par //
analyzed: rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs par //
translated: In terms of fathoms, furlongs, and so on,

analyzed: rdo rje thig tshad sbyor brjod pas; ;phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa //

analyzed: sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs // sna tshogs rig pas dbang bsgyur ba'i //

original: sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du //
translated: Of the thousand buddhas with the knowledge of variety,

original: stobs ldan bu mo la brten te //
analyzed: stobs ldan bu mo la brten te //
translated: One relies on the powerful maiden

original: thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas //

original: rdo rje tshe la dbang thob cing //
analyzed: rdo rje tshe la dbang thob cing //
translated: One attains power over the vajra life force

original: cho 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur //🔽dang po yon tan kun ldan pa'i //
analyzed: cho 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur // dang po yon tan kun ldan pa'i //
translated: and possesses the superknowledges and miracles.

original: rigs su nges pa'i bu mchog ste //🔽dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi //
analyzed: rigs su nges pa'i bu mchog ste // dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi //
translated: First, the supreme child of the family, who possesses all good qualities,

original: mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la //🔽drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob pa; ;rgyal po lta bu bla ma yis //
analyzed: mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la // drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob pa; ;rgyal po lta bu bla ma yis //

original: lhag pa gzugs brnyan byin ldan du //
analyzed: lhag pa gzugs brnyan byin ldan du //

original: dad mos brtson 'grus 'jug pa yi //
analyzed: dad mos brtson 'grus 'jug pa yi //

analyzed: mi ldog dang brtan tshul gyis bzhugs //

original: dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba //
translated: the armor, the mudra, and the banner.🔽The natural, essential mode of existence is

original: rang bzhin ngo bos gnas tshul na; ;rdzas thabs ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: rang bzhin ngo bos gnas tshul na; ;rdzas thabs ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas //
translated: the conferral of the empowerment of substances, methods, and samadhi.

original: nus pa'i byin rlabs mngon shar nas //
analyzed: nus pa'i byin rlabs mngon shar nas //
translated: The blessings of potential arise manifestly

original: theg chen rdo rje rigs su 'gyur //
analyzed: theg chen rdo rje rigs su 'gyur //

original: de nas skal ldan slob ma des //🔽tha mal 'du @281a *//
analyzed: de nas skal ldan slob ma des // tha mal 'du @281a *//

original: shes kun bzlog ste //
analyzed: shes kun bzlog ste //

original: rang rang lhar bcas gsal ba la //🔽nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas //
analyzed: rang rang lhar bcas gsal ba la // nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas //
translated: and, in the clarity of each one’s own deity,🔽the empowerment of listening,🔽the empowerment of meditation,🔽the empowerment of activity,

analyzed: nyan pa'i dbang dang sgom pa dang // 'chang dang 'phrin las byed pa dang // rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon dbang //

original: rang bzhin ngo bos gnas pa la //
analyzed: rang bzhin ngo bos gnas pa la //
translated: The empowerment of the nature that exists by nature🔽is conferred with water on water,🔽rice, and samādhi.

original: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // 'bras dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas; ;mi nus pa thob pa'i tshad //
analyzed: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // 'bras dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas; ;mi nus pa thob pa'i tshad //
translated: The measure of attainment is not being able to

original: mi nus pa la bskur ba min //
analyzed: mi nus pa la bskur ba min //

original: tshad ldan rnams la rim par bskur //
analyzed: tshad ldan rnams la rim par bskur //

original: rig ma las kyi phyag rgya mo //
analyzed: rig ma las kyi phyag rgya mo //

original: bcu drug bco brgyad ldan pa yi //
analyzed: bcu drug bco brgyad ldan pa yi //

original: dri zhim yon tan ldan pa la //
analyzed: dri zhim yon tan ldan pa la //

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //

original: rgyal ba kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i //

original: rdo rje padma'i rtsa 'khor lo //
analyzed: rdo rje padma'i rtsa 'khor lo //

original: ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa //

original: thabs dang shes rab snod kyi mchog /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snod kyi mchog /

original: thabs gsum tshul gyis rtser bstims pas //
analyzed: thabs gsum tshul gyis rtser bstims pas //

original: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kun //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kun //

analyzed: yungs kar tshad tsam rdo rje sems //
