original: rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las //
analyzed: rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las //

analyzed: gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te //

original: rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo nyid //

analyzed: mar me 'od ltar gsal gyur pas; ;bde chen nyams dang rtags thob pa //

analyzed: de ltar nyid 'byung the tshom med //

original: rdo rje'i nyi ma rab ldan pa'i //
analyzed: rdo rje'i nyi ma rab ldan pa'i //

original: bcu bzhi bcu drug rab lon pa //
analyzed: bcu bzhi bcu drug rab lon pa //

analyzed: phyi nang gsang ba'i @281b yon tan nyid //

original: byin rlabs rig ma lha mor byas //
analyzed: byin rlabs rig ma lha mor byas //

original: chags pa skyed pa'i thabs rnams nyid //
analyzed: chags pa skyed pa'i thabs rnams nyid //

original: blo dang ldan pas mngon sum bya //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas mngon sum bya //

original: de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas //
analyzed: de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas //

analyzed: bla mas gnyis med gtad bya'i phyir //

original: byin rlabs sbyor ba byas nas yang //
analyzed: byin rlabs sbyor ba byas nas yang //

analyzed: gnyis ka'i srin lag bzung nas ni //

original: slob ma 'di la legs gtad la //
analyzed: slob ma 'di la legs gtad la //

original: gsang ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya //

original: skyes bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin //
analyzed: skyes bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin //

original: de ring phan chad bu mchog khyod //
analyzed: de ring phan chad bu mchog khyod //

analyzed: sgo gsum lha ru mnyam sbyor bas //

original: tha mal dman pa'i lta ba spang //
analyzed: tha mal dman pa'i lta ba spang //

original: bde ba chen po nyams myong bas //
analyzed: bde ba chen po nyams myong bas //

original: dka' thub theg pa'i lta ba spang //
analyzed: dka' thub theg pa'i lta ba spang //

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa //

original: bde ba'i nyams myong brtan par byos //
analyzed: bde ba'i nyams myong brtan par byos //

analyzed: brtan pa bar chad med pa bsgom; ;rdo rje 'chang gis la 'gro //

original: de bas skal ldan rigs bzang kye //
analyzed: de bas skal ldan rigs bzang kye //

original: gtan du 'bar bar ma byed cig /
analyzed: gtan du 'bar bar ma byed cig /
translated: do not be constantly ablaze.🔽Since one has attained power over the method of union,

analyzed: sbyor ba'i thabs dang ting 'dzin dang // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas //
translated: samādhi, and the moving vāyu,

analyzed: thig le'i las la thogs pa med //

original: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed //

original: ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid //
analyzed: ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid //

analyzed: sa yang bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa; ;nyams myong brten cing gnyis med sbyar //

analyzed: rlung gis brten pa'i thig le nyid //

original: ro gcig dus mnyam tshul byung ba //
analyzed: ro gcig dus mnyam tshul byung ba //

original: drag pa ma yin dal ba min //
analyzed: drag pa ma yin dal ba min //

analyzed: dgongs @282a *// pa nyams dang zhen chags min //

analyzed: a'a li k'a li zhu ba'i sems //

original: sangs rgyas phreng ba gnyis su med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phreng ba gnyis su med //

original: rdo rje padma rab bskyod cing //
analyzed: rdo rje padma rab bskyod cing //

analyzed: 'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya las; ;nyi zla rtse phrad 'byor pa na //

original: byed pa rlung gi thig le gzung //
analyzed: byed pa rlung gi thig le gzung //

original: rgyu ba gcad cing thig le mnan //
analyzed: rgyu ba gcad cing thig le mnan //

original: shes pa nam mkha'i ngang la gtad //
analyzed: shes pa nam mkha'i ngang la gtad //
translated: The consciousness is focused in the state of space.

original: dbang po shes rab che chung gis //
analyzed: dbang po shes rab che chung gis //
translated: Through the greater or lesser wisdom of the sense organ,

original: lan gsum brtan par gyur pa'am //
analyzed: lan gsum brtan par gyur pa'am //

original: ma thob bar du sbyin par bya //
analyzed: ma thob bar du sbyin par bya //
translated: or until it is attained.

original: rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma //
analyzed: rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma //

original: dman dang rigs ngan rnam par spangs //
analyzed: dman dang rigs ngan rnam par spangs //

original: rdo rje dbang pos ma phog cing //
analyzed: rdo rje dbang pos ma phog cing //

original: gzhan dbang longs spyod ma byas pa //
analyzed: gzhan dbang longs spyod ma byas pa //

original: bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lnga'ang rung //
analyzed: bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lnga'ang rung //

original: thabs dang zas dang spyod lam gyis //
analyzed: thabs dang zas dang spyod lam gyis //

original: bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya //
translated: The rite of approach is performed according to the text.🔽The vajra tongue, ring finger,

analyzed: rdo rje lce dang srin lag dang // srin lag bcos ma la sogs pa //
translated: and the ring finger of the creation stage, and so on,

original: thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis //
analyzed: thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis //
translated: are the method and the branch of anointment.

original: gsang ba'i pho brang rgyas par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i pho brang rgyas par bya //

original: 'khor ba zil gnon rtsa rnyed nas //
analyzed: 'khor ba zil gnon rtsa rnyed nas //
translated: Having found the nāḍī that suppresses samsara,

original: bdag po dung can rnam par sbyar //
analyzed: bdag po dung can rnam par sbyar //
translated: the lord is united with the conch.

original: thig le myur bul rtags byung nas //
analyzed: thig le myur bul rtags byung nas //
translated: When the signs of the swift and slow bindu arise,

original: rgyu ba rlung gi tshad du zung //
analyzed: rgyu ba rlung gi tshad du zung //

original: nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la //🔽'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po //
analyzed: nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la // 'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po //
translated: When the sun and moon rise simultaneously,🔽samsara is suppressed.

original: myong bas chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob //
analyzed: myong bas chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob //
translated: The great method is the stream of experience.

original: gal te rtsa dang bral pa na //
analyzed: gal te rtsa dang bral pa na //
translated: If one is separated from the nāḍīs,

original: phat dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: phat dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur //
translated: if one possesses phaṭ, one will move.

original: dvangs rlung mnyam pas zin par 'gyur //
analyzed: dvangs rlung mnyam pas zin par 'gyur //

original: bzlog pa 'dren pa'i h'um gis shes //
analyzed: bzlog pa 'dren pa'i h'um gis shes //

original: sdud pa'i h'um gis bsdams gnas pa //
analyzed: sdud pa'i h'um gis bsdams gnas pa //

original: thig @282b les lus la khyab par byed //
analyzed: thig @282b les lus la khyab par byed //

original: dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste //
analyzed: dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste //

original: gnyis pas nus pa skyed pa yin //
analyzed: gnyis pas nus pa skyed pa yin //

original: gsum pas nyams myong skyed pa yin //
analyzed: gsum pas nyams myong skyed pa yin //

original: bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed //
analyzed: bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed //

original: lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas //
analyzed: lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas //

original: mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub //

original: rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob ba //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob ba //

original: nus ldan rab gnas cho ga brtsam //
analyzed: nus ldan rab gnas cho ga brtsam //

original: de nas slob ma tshul bzhin gzhug /
analyzed: de nas slob ma tshul bzhin gzhug /

original: sgo gsum nyes pa kun bral ba'i //
analyzed: sgo gsum nyes pa kun bral ba'i //

original: sdom pa'i dam tshig phog byas la //
analyzed: sdom pa'i dam tshig phog byas la //
translated: The samayas of the vow are conferred.

original: dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya //
analyzed: dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya //
translated: The stages of empowerment are given.

original: dbang gi nyams myong brtan bya'i phyir //
analyzed: dbang gi nyams myong brtan bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to stabilize the experience of empowerment,

original: gdams ngag rjes mthun sbyin par bya //
analyzed: gdams ngag rjes mthun sbyin par bya //

original: gdams ngag nyams brtan lam rim ste //
analyzed: gdams ngag nyams brtan lam rim ste //

original: lam mthar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid //
analyzed: lam mthar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid //
translated: The culmination of the path is the result.

original: drod mthar phyin dang sa brgyad dang // grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la //🔽rang rig rtags dang thugs rje yis //
analyzed: drod mthar phyin dang sa brgyad dang // grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la // rang rig rtags dang thugs rje yis //
translated: The stage of the culmination of warmth, the eighth stage, and the stage of buddhahood, which is of great renown.🔽The three kinds of dakinis appear:

original: 'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du snang //
analyzed: 'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du snang //
translated: those who are led by self-awareness, those who are led by signs, and those who are led by compassion.🔽The one known as Padminī,

original: mkha' dang sgra dang gzugs can gyi; ;padma can zhes grags pa yi //
analyzed: mkha' dang sgra dang gzugs can gyi; ;padma can zhes grags pa yi //
translated: who is in the sky, in sound, and in form,

original: sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang ba dang // gzugs tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang ba dang // gzugs tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur //
translated: is liberated by the appearance of union, song, and dance, and by the stability of mere form.

original: dbang bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: dbang bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //

original: ma bcos rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: ma bcos rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor //
translated: is the unfabricated maṇḍala of the vajra realm.

original: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste //
analyzed: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste //
translated: The maṇḍala of wrath is a branch

original: sgrub dang gdug pa gdul phyir yin //
analyzed: sgrub dang gdug pa gdul phyir yin //
translated: in order to accomplish and subdue evil ones.

original: dang la rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas //
analyzed: dang la rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas //
translated: Having obtained the fundamental empowerment,🔽one should obtain the empowerment

original: phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor @283a *//🔽dbang thob bya //
analyzed: phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor @283a *// dbang thob bya //
translated: of the outer maṇḍala.

original: gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtsan la //
analyzed: gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtsan la //
translated: The empowerment is based on the disciple’s interest;

original: thun mong tsam du nges pa med //
analyzed: thun mong tsam du nges pa med //
translated: there is no certainty about the common [empowerments].

original: dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag /
analyzed: dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag /
translated: The first, second, and third

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin //
translated: are the empowerment of Vajrasattva.

original: bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa nyid //
analyzed: bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa nyid //
translated: The fourth and fifth

original: he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Is the maṇḍala of Heruka.🔽The master who shows the unerring path

original: dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa'i //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa'i //
translated: And is blessed by the victors of the three times🔽Is not pleased or honored

original: ma nor lam ston slob dpon la; ;mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing //🔽rang rang nus shing 'jug pa la //
analyzed: ma nor lam ston slob dpon la; ;mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing // rang rang nus shing 'jug pa la //
translated: By those who are not suitable vessels.🔽Without the permission of the consecration

original: dbang bskur gnang ba ma byin par //
analyzed: dbang bskur gnang ba ma byin par //
translated: And the bestowal of empowerment,🔽The explanation of the secret, listening,

original: gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang // sgom dang sgrub pa la sogs pas //🔽bskal pa bye ba dpag med du //
analyzed: gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang // sgom dang sgrub pa la sogs pas // bskal pa bye ba dpag med du //
translated: Meditation, practice, and so on,🔽The result will not be attained

original: 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur gyi //
translated: For countless millions of eons.

original: dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
translated: One will be born in the realm of hell.

original: de ni dam pa kun brnyas pas //
analyzed: de ni dam pa kun brnyas pas //
translated: Since the sublime one is despised,🔽There will be many illnesses and sufferings,

original: nad dang sdug sngal mang po dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe //
analyzed: nad dang sdug sngal mang po dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe //
translated: And one will be harmed by ḍākinīs and spirits.

original: de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur //🔽byin rlabs ldan pa'i bla ma yis; ;dad brtson brtul zhugs rab ldan pa'i //
analyzed: de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur // byin rlabs ldan pa'i bla ma yis; ;dad brtson brtul zhugs rab ldan pa'i //
translated: Then, one will certainly die.🔽The supreme person of definite lineage🔽Who has faith, diligence, and discipline

original: rigs nges skyes bu mchog nyid la //
analyzed: rigs nges skyes bu mchog nyid la //
translated: Is blessed by the guru who possesses blessing

original: thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na //
analyzed: thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na //
translated: And is given the empowerment through skillful means.

original: rgyal ba dang ni mkha' 'gro dang // rig 'dzin grub pa pho mo yis //
analyzed: rgyal ba dang ni mkha' 'gro dang // rig 'dzin grub pa pho mo yis //
translated: and the male and female siddhas

original: tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skong zhing //
analyzed: tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skong zhing //
translated: fulfill all wishes in this life.🔽The lord of the perfect

original: byin rlabs dbang dang dngos grub kyi //
analyzed: byin rlabs dbang dang dngos grub kyi //
translated: empowerment, blessing, and siddhi

original: phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por @283b 'gyur; ;gang gis gang la dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por @283b 'gyur; ;gang gis gang la dbang bskur bas //
translated: is empowered by whomever.🔽Since ordinary clinging is purified

original: tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang // bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas //
analyzed: tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang // bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas //
translated: and one enters the path of great bliss,

original: dngos grub gang la thogs med de //
analyzed: dngos grub gang la thogs med de //
translated: there is no impediment to any siddhi.🔽Whatever activities are undertaken are accomplished,

original: las rnams gang brtsam 'grub pa dang // 'dod pa'i don la rol pa yis //
analyzed: las rnams gang brtsam 'grub pa dang // 'dod pa'i don la rol pa yis //
translated: and one enjoys the meaning of desire.

original: sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin nas //
analyzed: sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin nas //
translated: Having perfected the stages of the ten bhūmis,

original: padma spyan gyi sa thob ste //
analyzed: padma spyan gyi sa thob ste //
translated: one attains the bhūmi of Padma Netra.

original: yi ge 'khor los la gnas //🔽sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las //
analyzed: yi ge 'khor los la gnas // sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las //
translated: One abides in the maṇḍala of syllables.🔽The twenty-five are spontaneously present

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun grub pa //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun grub pa //
translated: from the qualities of the enlightened body, speech, mind, and qualities.

original: dbang gi 'bras bu rang las shar //
analyzed: dbang gi 'bras bu rang las shar //
translated: The result of empowerment arises from oneself.

original: thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na //
analyzed: thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na //
translated: Whoever is separated from this great method🔽and seeks the result with diligence

original: bskal pa gang+g'a'i bye snyed du //
analyzed: bskal pa gang+g'a'i bye snyed du //
translated: for eons equal to the number of grains of sand in the Ganges River

original: brtson pas 'bras bu tshol byed pa //
analyzed: brtson pas 'bras bu tshol byed pa //
translated: will not attain the result.

original: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu stong par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu stong par 'gyur //
translated: The desired result will be empty.🔽Because of the master, the disciple,

original: gang phyir slob dpon slob ma dang // dkyil 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du //🔽las dang ting 'dzin byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: gang phyir slob dpon slob ma dang // dkyil 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du // las dang ting 'dzin byin rlabs kyis //
translated: and the maṇḍala, in stages,🔽the rite of entry is explained

original: 'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad //
translated: in three parts: karma, samādhi, and empowerment.🔽The great secret of the body, speech, and mind

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //🔽sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen po //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi // sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen po //
translated: of all buddhas of the three times

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po //
translated: is the great path of the net of magical illusion.

original: ma lus cho ga rgya chen po //
analyzed: ma lus cho ga rgya chen po //
translated: The great rite of all is

original: dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi /🔽'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi / 'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du //
translated: the glorious vajra mirror.🔽As it is, one should understand all secrets

original: gsang ba kun la shes par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba kun la shes par bya //
translated: in accordance with the stages of entry.

original: rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis //
analyzed: rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis //
translated: The vajra guru,

original: cha byad gus ldan mdzes pa yis //🔽me tog ldan pas 'khor lo nyid //
analyzed: cha byad gus ldan mdzes pa yis // me tog ldan pas 'khor lo nyid //
translated: with a beautiful, respectful appearance,🔽and with flowers,

original: mngon byas sku gsung bskul pa yis //
analyzed: mngon byas sku gsung bskul pa yis //
translated: having manifested the wheel,

original: dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur //
analyzed: dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur //
translated: should be mindful of the samaya and contemplate.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor @284a *//
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor @284a *//
translated: In the maṇḍala of Vajrasattva,

original: du; ;gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni //
analyzed: du; ;gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni //
translated: with the power of clarity and awareness,

original: rdo rje slob ma byin brlab phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje slob ma byin brlab phyir //
translated: in order to bless the vajra disciples,🔽the maṇḍala should be drawn.

original: slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya //
analyzed: slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya //
translated: And the master should also enter.🔽Then the disciple should enter,

original: de nas slob ma 'jug bya ste; ;khrus byas dri zhim gos bzang gon //
analyzed: de nas slob ma 'jug bya ste; ;khrus byas dri zhim gos bzang gon //
translated: Having bathed, wearing fragrant, fine clothing,

original: dad dang gus ldan rin chen bcas //
analyzed: dad dang gus ldan rin chen bcas //
translated: Faithful, respectful, holding jewels,

original: gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni //
analyzed: gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni //
translated: With devotion, in sweet-sounding words,🔽Offering the body, abiding with a pure mind.

original: lus dbul dag pa'i sems kyis gnas; ;bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: lus dbul dag pa'i sems kyis gnas; ;bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: With the practice of Amṛtakuṇḍali,

original: bar chad sbyor bsal srung ba bya //
analyzed: bar chad sbyor bsal srung ba bya //
translated: Remove obstacles and hindrances, and perform protection.

original: cho ga gang yin lhar bskyed la //
analyzed: cho ga gang yin lhar bskyed la //
translated: In the ritual, generate the deity,

original: mtshan ma rdzogs par nan tan bya //
analyzed: mtshan ma rdzogs par nan tan bya //
translated: And earnestly perfect the signs.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga //
translated: The five samayas of all victors

original: 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin //
analyzed: 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin //
translated: Are given with the three syllables and endowed with body, speech, and mind.

original: snying gar rdo rje brtan byas la //
analyzed: snying gar rdo rje brtan byas la //
translated: Having stabilized the vajra at the heart,

original: dam tshig legs par dbog par bya //
analyzed: dam tshig legs par dbog par bya //
translated: Properly confer the samayas.

original: tsandan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu //
analyzed: tsandan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu //
translated: Consecrated water of white and red sandalwood

original: lan gsum blud la snod dor ro //
analyzed: lan gsum blud la snod dor ro //
translated: Should be given three times, and the vessel should be cast aside.

original: de nas rang gis dam bsgrags te //
analyzed: de nas rang gis dam bsgrags te //
translated: Then, having proclaimed oneself,

original: gsang ba'i don la nges par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i don la nges par bya //
translated: One should be certain in the meaning of the secret.

original: rang rang 'brel pa'i lha nyid la //
analyzed: rang rang 'brel pa'i lha nyid la //
translated: For each individual, the deity with whom one is connected

original: rin chen dor te brtag par bya //
analyzed: rin chen dor te brtag par bya //
translated: Should cast the jewel and be examined.

original: sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la //
translated: Having summoned him with mantra and mudra,

original: bstims la dbyer med gnas pa la //
analyzed: bstims la dbyer med gnas pa la //
translated: dissolve him and abide in inseparability.

original: rtag tu byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtag tu byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to always abide in consecration,

original: legs par brtan pa'i cho ga bya //
analyzed: legs par brtan pa'i cho ga bya //
translated: perform the rite of firm establishment.

original: mi shes rab rib bsal byas la //
analyzed: mi shes rab rib bsal byas la //
translated: Having removed the cataracts of ignorance,

original: 'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya //
analyzed: 'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya //
translated: generate manifest pride in the wheel.

original: de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi //
analyzed: de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi //
translated: Then, the purity of the deity and maṇḍala

original: dag pa rim gyis brtan par bya //🔽@284b de nas bla ma sangs rgyas la //
analyzed: dag pa rim gyis brtan par bya // @284b de nas bla ma sangs rgyas la //
translated: should be gradually stabilized.

original: ma lus ci yod dbul bar bya //🔽byin brlabs cho ga dag pa yi //
analyzed: ma lus ci yod dbul bar bya // byin brlabs cho ga dag pa yi //
translated: Then, offer everything one has to the guru buddha.🔽The qualities of the consecration rite,🔽the maṇḍala offerings, and meditation are inconceivable;

original: dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgom pa dang // zhugs pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab; ;rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgom pa dang // zhugs pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab; ;rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: one will become a vajra holder.

original: des na rigs su nges pa yis //
analyzed: des na rigs su nges pa yis //
translated: Therefore, one who is certain in the family

original: dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan //
analyzed: dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan //
translated: should first be taught the stages of entering.

original: rtsa ba yan lag kun thob nas //
analyzed: rtsa ba yan lag kun thob nas //
translated: Having obtained all the root and branch [commitments],🔽the empowerments should be conferred in stages.

original: rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro; ;de nas bla ma'i bka' mnos la //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro; ;de nas bla ma'i bka' mnos la //
translated: Then, having received the guru’s command,

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
translated: one should accomplish the desired spiritual powers.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud las /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud las /
translated: The Tantra of the Secret Mirror of the Net of Magical Manifestations of Vajrasattva states:

original: dbang bskur ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
translated: This is the seventh chapter on the complete explanation of the empowerment conferral from the Tantra of the Secret Mirror of the Net of Magical Manifestations of Vajrasattva.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //🔽rdo rje dam tshig bla na med //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba // rdo rje dam tshig bla na med //
translated: Next, I will explain🔽the unsurpassed sacred pledge of the vajra.

original: sdom pa brtan po dam bcas pa //
analyzed: sdom pa brtan po dam bcas pa //
translated: The firm vow is a promise

original: 'di dag legs par bshad par bya //
analyzed: 'di dag legs par bshad par bya //
translated: that should be properly explained.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
translated: All buddhas of the three times

original: 'das dang ma byon dus gsum du //
analyzed: 'das dang ma byon dus gsum du //
translated: in the past, present, and future

original: rgyal khrims tha tshig bkas bcad ltar //
analyzed: rgyal khrims tha tshig bkas bcad ltar //
translated: are like the royal laws and edicts

original: rim pas mdod bor bkas bcad pa'i //
analyzed: rim pas mdod bor bkas bcad pa'i //
translated: that are gradually established by decree.

original: byin brlabs rang bzhin 'da' dka' ba //
analyzed: byin brlabs rang bzhin 'da' dka' ba //
translated: The blessings are difficult to transgress;

original: kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad //🔽gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i //
analyzed: kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad // gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i //
translated: it is explained that everyone should guard them.🔽Because this is the great sacred pledge

original: dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la //
translated: blessed by the sublime ones,

original: 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i //
analyzed: 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i //
translated: the buddhas of the past, present, and future

original: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang // rig 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang // lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang // klu dang mi min 'byung @285a *//
analyzed: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang // rig 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang // lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang // klu dang mi min 'byung @285a *//
translated: The nagas, the demigods, and the assemblies of bhutas,

original: po'i tshogs // rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang //
analyzed: po'i tshogs // rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang //
translated: Even the great gods with their magical powers

original: dam pa 'das pas 'tshig par 'gyur //
analyzed: dam pa 'das pas 'tshig par 'gyur //
translated: Will be burned by the passing of the sublime one.

original: dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di //
analyzed: dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di //
translated: This nature of the sublime one

original: rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la //
translated: Is the transcendent state of all the victorious ones.

original: sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams //
analyzed: sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams //
translated: Those individuals who practice according to the literal meaning
